If this tv turns out to be reliable I will definitely consider another TCL in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Price - 43" TCL 1080p LED!!
Reviews.Author: Garry W Johnson
Reviews.Content: I did a ton of searching and almost bought 3 other tv's (42" to 46") - in searching one last time I found this TCL and did more digging.  The first review here on Amazon was what got me, the fact that the TCL used the same screens as Samsung - after some internet digging I found they were a major vendor for Samsung.  Long story short - I decided to give it a try and was going to get one at my nearby Walmart but found it had to be delivered there.  I trust Amazon's shipping much more than Walmart and received it in perfect condition.  The stand was annoying to put on - as other people mentioned - for me, I had to use another screw in each hole before using the screws they sent with, they were just too big for the hole.  Once I did that, no problem.  It's super light and easy to setup.  Just a small black frame around the entire screen gives it a simple and elegant appearance.  I have a great stereo setup that I use with it but when I'm too lazy to get up and turn it on, I'm surprisingly ok with the sound from the tv.  The picture is truly excellent!  The only adjustment out of the box was to change it to cinematic - the stand setting was washing out the blacks.  Watching sports in HD is awesome as are BlueRay movies.  With Amazon's customer service and the 2 year warranty - my fears were satisfied enough to order and after 2 months of owning it, I can say that I am thrilled with my choice!

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV FOR ME !!
Reviews.Author: firstflatscreen
Reviews.Content: This is our first flat screen bought 7/15/12, chosen for price and size to replace our 25yr old tv that still worked but looked old. $388 w/free shipping arrived in 4 days, easy assembly. Plugged it in to att uverse box using rca jacks from the old tv. We really liked the SD picture, then we came across att uverse free HD channel... WOW!! We immediatley ordered att uverse HD service.. INCREDIBLE!! We used the tv remote to change the personal sound setting to make it LOUD, and bought an HDMI cable and that was it! I havent looked at the manual yet. We LOVE this tv, it is light, the thin frame and minimal styling look great and the screen and back are cool to touch. Our room has window and light glare that is NOT noticeable when the tv is on. We used the usb flash connector to view photo's but have not connected a dvd or Wii yet because still enjoying our new tv experience (can you tell we're old). Sometimes you get more than you expect and for us this was one of those times.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Value
Reviews.Author: Anosala
Reviews.Content: Just got mine in, Fantastic upgrade from an older picture tube clunker, Audio is not the best, but very easy fix if you have a separate audio component system, All I had to do is buy an earphone jack to convert to double RCA, plugged it into my old stereo equipment, and man, what a awesome professional looking and sounding home theater! I am very pleased with this set up, I hope to get many years of enjoyment as I am obviously a cheapy home product buyer. This unit also does not run HOT like an older type picture tube TV, not a dust magnet either. For the price, well worth the price, I am very satisfied with this product

Reviews.Title: for what it is
Reviews.Author: jdub
Reviews.Content: i work for dish and i come across a bunch of cheap tvs and customers are disappointed when i hook HD to the tv. they question the picture quality and whole time i want to tell them u buy a cheap tv and u get a cheap picture. this isnt the case with TCL. i read the reviews and was excited to see what i got. granted its not what your gonna get with a higher priced brand name but for $350 its damn good. i bought this tv for my bedroom and didnt need to go all out, perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Al's Kid
Reviews.Content: Crisp picture in HD TV(do you have an HD receiver?). The volume can be adjusted and is plenty loud; I suggest you adjust the equalizer to your ear!  My use is for the bedroom and the volume level never goes past half-way.Looking forward to hooking up a blu-ray player. Economical,seems as though it's a good quality TV-remember make adjustments to the picture and sound-you won't be disappointed! Options-if you don't like TV return it promptly or take out extended warranty if uneasy or for piece of mind? Do yourself a favor and read the owners manual.

Reviews.Title: Rating is based on what it is, an inexpensive TV for bedroom
Reviews.Author: tb54by
Reviews.Content: I must admit after reading some of the negative reviews I was expecting the TV to be DOA or die pretty quickly. So far so good, do not think that the 4 stars mean it's as good as a 1080p theatre projector or our Samsung in the family room. But, it is a very nice affordable TV to use in the bedroom. The sound is poor, but just about every flat panel has sound issues. Open the equalizer in the audio settings and boost the two to the left up almost all the way gives a vast improvement. If you have a cable box like mine you can use the TOSLINK to hook it up to a sound bar.Do not buy this if you are using it for a family room because as other reviewers have mentioned when you get to the sides the picture fades. But in the bedroom both sides of the bed are in the narrow sweet spot cone which I estimate at no more than 35 degrees before fading begins. (35 may be generous)But within the cone I was surprised by how good the picture really is.Pros: 1.Price, price and price. 2. Nice picture in the small cone for the money. Surprised at how good I could get the picture with the very limited picture adjustment settings. Due to the limited settings it was very quick calibrating with Disney's Wow. But there is a big improvement. I turned the dynamic backlight, the Light sensor and the SABC to off. Sacrificing the little bit of energy savings for a better overall picture. These three items should be in the con section because I found the picture to be erratic when they were on. Over the air HD looks great, cable HD looks great, Blu Ray looks great and cable StandardDef is adequate but you must zoom the heck out of it to remove the black bars. With no up converter SD is what it is.Cons: 1. small viewing cone 2. I wish the HDMI cable inputs were on the bottom side of where the other inputs are. For wall mounting you could then route the HDMI cable behind and through the middle opening without having to bend it so sharp like you do now then hide the wires. Routing the HDMI cable from the side back to the middle and down puts way to much force on the connectors because of the sharp bend required.3. Some may be bothered by the shiny screen, I have a tilt mount and a bright light overhead that doesn't bother the picture one bit.4.More calibration settings would be nice but hey it's a 328 dollar LED 1080p TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice Quality - Speakers lacking though
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: Great looking TV, looks like a samsung to be perfectly honest. Light weight, high end stand, with a multi-function remote. Channels look quite good on non-HD stations as I dont have access to HD except OTA ones. Only drawback about this TV is the sound. It is horrible, and it doesnt matter what setting you change it still sounds bad. Its very hard to hear the tv from 5ft away at a high volume. Its not a deal killer for me but it may bother some people. Overall a great deal for the price.

Reviews.Title: Just about what I was expecting
Reviews.Author: JAnderson
Reviews.Content: Was looking for an inexpensive TV to go in my bedroom to replace my old tube big screen. I found this on Amazon and after reading reviews and given the price, I decided to jump on it. I spoiled myself with LED in my living room and still wanted LED if I was going to buy a new TV so this worked out great.No, it isn't up to par with my LG that I have in the living room, but that's not what I was expecting with a TV priced half the price. Picture quality is great, and the sound isn't terrible but I did decide to plug into a small stereo unit I have via the headphone jack and it amped the sound up pretty nice. All in all it is a great inexpensive TV for bedroom, office etc. I purchased the 39" and I am starting to regret not going for the 43 but the size works and I am not too concerned about it.And for those wondering - The 39 does support up to 200 vesa for mounting (I believe even the 43 does) - So the Cheetah mount advertised on this products page works just fine. That is what I bought and it went perfectly (other than needing a couple longer screws). TV looks great on the wall and I am very happy.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I'm very pleased with the TCL 39" TV. I never heard of TCL brand before but the reviews on Amazon.com and 2 yr warranty made me give it a try. The picture quality is good and more than pleased with color representation and its ability to handle action scenes.The thin bezel makes this TV look good and may allow you to fit the TCL 39" versus a 37" with larger bezel.This TV is light: The 39" TV weighs less than 20lbs. I'm still old school (heavy = quality), but it was cinch to setup and move the TV around with very little effort. It will be easy to take it outside on nice days.Couple of items to be aware of:- Sound quality is lacking but manually raising the bass and treble made it sufficient for all but serious (suspense, action...) movie watching.- Make sure you use a correct size Philips screwdriver when attaching the base as it takes bit of an effort to tighten the screws all the way.

Reviews.Title: Just WOW!
Reviews.Author: Florida Pat
Reviews.Content: I've wanted to get a huge monitior for quite some time but didn't want to pay the big bucks to do it. I've been using a 24" Samsung Syncmaster in my home office and a 27" Planar Systems PX2710MW at my second office. Both are good and certainly larger screens than the screen on my Dell XPS 14Z.A few days ago I decided to search again and see what type of monitor I could get for under $500. I was pleasantly surprised to find this TCL 39-inch LED HDTV for less than $350. Adding $3.99 for one-day shipping (love Prime!) brought the total cost to $353.97.The monitor came yesterday, less than 24 hours after I placed my order. It was easy to set up and attach to my Dell laptop via the HDMI 2 port on the monitor.Just WOW! The screen size is significantly larger than my current monitors (which I will link together at my other office) and after trying various resolutions, I am extremely pleased with everything about this monitor.Oh, and another plus was the weight... 15 pounds versus 30+ for most other HDTVs of the same size.Very, very happy with this purchase. If anything changes, I'll revise this review but I'm expecting nothing but good things from this monitor.

Reviews.Title: Quality Control could use a lot of work
Reviews.Author: F. Li
Reviews.Content: I was a bit skeptical buying an off-brand TV until I read some of the reviews on forums that indicated this company uses Samsung screen panels in their TVs. Out of the box, the TV looked slick, well designed, and had a nice heavy base if you're not mounting it. I was going to primarily use this as a computer monitor in my room and after hooking it up to the PC the screen powered on and I saw a bright crisp picture. The image it produced was great, almost on par with much higher priced lcd's. I played around with some settings and all seemed good. Then I was about to plug the antenna's coax into the back and noticed there was nothing there where the coax should be. Closer inspection showed the coax connector for the antenna line was never installed on my set and it left a gaping hole in the back. No idea how something so blatant could've been missed during manufacturing. I looked around the box and there was no loose parts and the box came to me in perfect condition. I was leaning towards a replacement set from Amazon until I played with the set a bit more and realized the second HDMI port also did not work. That port never detected any input from any source I plugged into it.If you get this set, be sure to test it out as much as you can within Amazon's return period. If something does break, I wouldn't bother with the warranty after reading many of the other reviews on both here and enthusiast forums. Many posts on the internet suggest that the warranty process is cumbersome if you get a response at all.Pros:+Samsung Panels+Crisp Image+Price (this fluctuates so do your research with other brands!)+Presets for color are decent+Long warranty if you're patient w/ cumbersome warranty process+Uses very little electric vs traditional LCD/Plasmas+Produces little heat+LEDCons:-Quality control can vary a bit it appears-Mixed reviews on warranty from other users-Appears to have a high defect rate from own experience and reviews of other usersNow, If I could part out the stars I would give this something like as follows:5 Stars - Image production3 Stars - Sound production (nothing amazing but not horrible)3 Stars - Warranty (2 years but good luck if you need it, they do seem to honor it if you're patient)------------Overall: 3.5 Stars since their defect rate just seems much higher than other manufacturers

Reviews.Title: decent tv at best
Reviews.Author: ctung
Reviews.Content: I dont know what TV people are getting to put reviews on saying that its quality is amazing, that TCL uses samsung screens.  I either received a crappy quality product or people's expectations went way down over the yearsI got the 39' model on my winter break from college, so I could only use it for a few days.  During those few days, I tried lying to myself that the quality was good, that it was a great buy.  My whole family came and told me that they didn't like it, but me being the stubborn person I am, insisted that that's how it should be.  So I went back to college, came back for spring break and used the TV again for a week.  During this week I really saw just how bad the quality was.The contrast is bad, the sharpness is bad, and the colors are decent.  I messed around with the modes but still this did not do anything.  I played a show that looks AMAZING on my 32' LG at college on this TV and it looked horrible.  There's no need to talk about anything technical here, if you go to any store with electronics and see their TV's on display, 80% of them will have WAY better display then this TV.Not only is the quality bad, but one thing that really irked me was that-the HDMI ports on this tv are not easily accesible at all.  If the covering on your connector part of your cable is even a little bit on the thick side, you'll have to push really hard and wiggle to make the connection, something that is very uncomfortable to do on a expensive TV.Eyes dont lie, I tried buying a TV that was cheap and good (reviews say that the reason why this TV is so cheap is because it has no extra features, but the quality is great) but there's no such thing.  trust me on this one and just save up an extra 100-200 dollars and buy namebrand(samsung/lg/panasonic) and you'll be much better off.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy!!!
Reviews.Author: Lori
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv.  Plugged it in and set it up.  Worked once and wouldn't work again.  Had to return it.

Reviews.Title: My TCL has issues or just doesnt work so good
Reviews.Author: Robert Tasa
Reviews.Content: The TV looks good and the video quality is awesome. The issues are, sound is just OK. Second and the worst is the channel list does not stick. I got through the channel scan and all the channels show up. Shut the TV off and ON and the Channel list is missing multiple channels. I then have to rescan which takes over 10 minutes. I had a smaller Toshiba LCD hooked up to the same cable connection and never had a problem. The last problem is a small one, the TV isn't known on any zapper list so I could combine my zappers into one.

Reviews.Title: Great Value Except Audio Output Snag
Reviews.Author: Buenvino
Reviews.Content: This is a great value tv if you do not want additional audio output for, say, Home Theater or recording.Unusually the HDMI connections are only Inputs. The only Output is a S/PDIF digital audio RCA plug that produces nothing after every effort to connect it. It does not work.The problem is compounded by TCL whose website appears to be a sham: no questions are ever answered or even acknowledged. This makes me extremely suspect about this new manufacturer.A shame since otherwise the picture is great and it is possible to play DVDs (getting Home Theater audio since of course the source is in the discs, not the tv) or hook up (without getting Home Theater sound) via Roku to Amazon, Netflix etc.

Reviews.Title: 15 dead pixels and no support.
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: Purchased this set 3 weeks ago; I'll keep it short:1. TV came with 15 dead pixels, 5 of them in a huge cluster.2. First tier of support jotted down my info, got my serial # and model #. They then told me to call their 2nd tier of support (1-877-470-7766)3. I've waited a total of 3hour and 45 minutes trying to get someone on the line. Every 5-6 minutes the call restarts with the automated response coming up. I'm also calling on 2 different phones (cell/skype)in hopes of getting someone..4. (This part is what pisses me off, and what they have done 6 times now): After 30-45 minutes on the phone, they pick up the phone (you can hear the workers talking in the background) and after about 5 seconds they hang up on you. That's it. Done. 45 minutes wasted on their BS.I too thought TCL would be a good buy because i heard they used Samsung b-grade panels, while that may be true, it's not worth the price to deal with their awful CS. Avoid these chinese-made TVs like the plague.

Reviews.Title: TV is OK, but Customer Support is horrible rendering 2 years warranty useless
Reviews.Author: Jozef Sovcik
Reviews.Content: I have purchased this TV two months ago.It has all you expect to get for the price.===BUT Customer Support is really BAD, BAD, BAD.1) company does not respond on emails sent to their official support address2) nor they respond to support requests posted directly on their web-page3) it is impossible to reach their 2nd level support - I've spent hours (not kidding) on-hold being assured that "your call is important to us" both in English and Spanish.TV is OK, if it is working. 2 years warranty is super, but COMPLETELY USELESS if you are not able to reach customer support.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: spv1425 "Consumer Advocate"
Reviews.Content: Recently bought this tv for my condo, didn't want an expensive one in case renters break it.  The picture is absolutely amazing. I would say it rivals my $1800 Samsung 3D tv even though only 60Mhz. The sound is not the best but if you have a stereo this is easily fixed. Compared to any other tv for the money or even double the price, you cannot beat this tv.  I'm going to buy another I like it so much.

Reviews.Title: I recommend this television to anyone
Reviews.Author: Robert Thompson
Reviews.Content: This tv is nice.  a couple of pixels are messed up but there are so many of them that you would have to be looking for them to find them.

Reviews.Title: Send me defective product
Reviews.Author: hiten
Reviews.Content: After purchase this product I feel below issue.1. Shipping was very late.2. Screen was defective. Right side screen is fully BLURRY and lot of light refection on right side screen.3. Sound quality is very low.4. Texts are not visible on the screen.5. The worst part  amazon "The big name" is sailing/shipping defective product to customers.In these days you can not have faith on any online shopping web portal. Product needs to view personally before purchase else they may ship you defective piece like me.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Value.
Reviews.Author: Eyes
Reviews.Content: Just got this today, and am I ever impressed.  It is packed full of all sorts of surprising abilities and capabilities!  You can easily connect it to your laptop, desktop, and Kindle Fire HDs.  If you get the EEKit, the cables that come in this kit are an incredible value, also.  If you order these two at the same time, you will have all you need to set up this television with any or all of the aforementioned!  You will be able to easily multi-task using these various units at the same time while you study and research.  An incredibly exciting experience.  If you get the App "Adobe Reader" for your Kindle Fire HDs, along with the Logitech 3.0 Bluetooth Wireless Keyboard, you will have the ease and convenience with these coupled together to assist you in making your study & research effortlessly focused on the content of what you are studying and researching rather than the distractions of less efficient means of doing your vital and important work.  Kudos to Amazon for their incredible agents whom assisted me in finding products that would best suit my needs, as well as the user-friendliness of their website in doing searches, accessing customer ratings of the products you are considering.  Topping it off with, a fantastic means of shopping and home delivery.

Reviews.Title: 1080p Monitor
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "cyberbillp"
Reviews.Content: I needed a monitor for my home office, one that had enough resolution so I could work properly.When this first arrived, I could not get 1080p to work on either computer. I solved the first one by updating the ATI video drivers. Before updating my PC, it said the native resolution of this monitor was 1360x768. I really thought I was going to end up with a lo-rez down-scaling monitor that I could not use. But new drivers fixed that and gave me hope for the my work computer.For my work computer I needed a DisplayPort to HDMI cable. Once it was rebooted with the new cable connected, I got the full 1080p resolution I needed.Now the picture is bright, I haven't noticed any monitor induced lag in any games or anything. I use external speakers so audio isn't an issue for me.So far it's a low-priced high-quality monitor for me.

Reviews.Title: Did not work right out of the box
Reviews.Author: create
Reviews.Content: Followed the directions. Connected all components. Turned on, and it immediately powers off. Disconnected all components other than cable box. Worked for an hour or so and powers off by itself once again. Connected only X-Box works an hour or so, then cuts itself off again. VERY disappointing Christmas gift for my step son. We will see how customer service handles the problem first thing tomorrow.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!!
Reviews.Author: Steve F
Reviews.Content: I worked for an electronics retail store for nearly 7 years, and when LCD, Plasma and DLP's came out, they cost 1000's of dollars. In fact, if I recall the cheapest would've been $3,000. I use to say to myself "I won't be able to buy one of those, I would have to save up forever". Well time has past, and 9-10 years later they're selling "LED" LCD TV's at a tenth of the price and quadruple the technology/features.I was very skeptical about getting this TV. But, I've done my research (Including reading some of the reviews on Amazon) and I have to say this is the best TV I have ever bought. I've had this TV since August and I use it everyday for multiple hours at a time and it still performs like it did when I took it out of the box. I use my laptop, DVR, and 4 different gaming systems to hook up to this TV and each unit functions as it should. The picture is clear and the colors are great. You really couldn't tell the difference between this and a Samsung unless of course you put it side by side. If you are purchasing this TV make sure you also consider a cleaning cloth/solution for it. I bought the "Philips SVC1116F/27 LCD, LED and Plasma Screen Cleaner" and couldn't be happier with that product too. It's cheap but it works terrific.It's not 120MHz but that really doesn't matter to me at all. I like viewing in 60MHz personally. The overall thickness of the unit isn't up to par with, let's say, Samsung, Panasonic, etc...but again, not really a deal breaker in my opinion. It is a little thick (depth-wise) but who actually cares about that, really?The remote control is very basic and simplified. I like to go to sleep while watching/listening to the TV so I use the Up/Down arrows on the remote to use the sleep timer (I think that's an ingenious idea using the sleep timer function by pressing Up or Down).Look, if you've been looking for a new TV that's not going to break the bank, consider purchasing this TV, you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Title: nice TV
Reviews.Author: maurader
Reviews.Content: i bought this tv because it was the largest tv i could fit in my entertainment cabinet... i switched up from a 720p 32in emerson... the picture is awesome... the sound isnt all that good but i have an audio system that makes this issue no concern at all... it just doesnt have audio out plugs so i had to hook up the sound system through the headphone plug. the picture is perfect.. a real joy to play my xbox with.

Reviews.Title: TCL and Amazon Both Screwed The Pooch
Reviews.Author: JW
Reviews.Content: I had originally bought this television used and it had defects but Amazon made it right and I got a new one that looks amazing. Don't be fulled by a low price, this television has a great picture! Very happy with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Easy to Set Up
Reviews.Author: autumnriver "autumnriver"
Reviews.Content: This TV has a beautiful picture.  The default brightness is set to "vibrant" which makes the colors very vivid, perhaps not to everyone's taste though I prefer it overall.  The TV is very thin and light, easy to move.  Set up and control is painless.  If you are using a universal remote, RCA three digit codes should work if you cannot find TCL codes on the internet.  The sound is inadequate, as is the case with most all ultra thin LED televisions these days.  An external amplifier and speakers are recommended.  If using a stereo amplifier you will not find analogue audio outputs, which is also the case with other new HDTVs.  You can easily work around this by purchasing an inexpensive headphone jack to RCA audio cable, which plugs into the headphone jack and will connect to amplifier inputs.  The only downside of this is that the sound has to be separately turned on and off with the TV, a small inconvenience.The stand is not very well engineered.  The metal plate which fits over the four screw holes is not perfectly aligned.  I found that I could not screw in the screws until the plate was entirely flush with the base, with the result that the TV on its stand is a bit more wobbly then it should be.Like my other two HDTV's, the "info" button on the remote will not correctly resolve the input resolution of streaming video:  it always says 720p/1080i no matter what the source resolution.  It would be nice if the engineers would make this function actually work.Overall, the TCL gives a very nice picture.  Except for the metal plate alignment issue, all the quibbles I have cited will be found on most any other new LED TV, so they should not count against this otherwise excellent product.

Reviews.Title: I'm Very Pleased: Be A Little Critical of the Critical Reviews!
Reviews.Author: Dr. Sean Henry
Reviews.Content: I bought the TCL LE39FHDF3300TA 2 weeks ago and it exceeds my expectations! Let me tell you how I use this device first: I only do on-demand streaming using a Roku box or as  wireless extended desktop to view content beamed from my laptop via bluetooth. I don't use it to watch the more traditional cable channels (I gave that up a few years ago). For my use, it works flawlessly. See other reviews for more technical details (I'm not good at that!).I looked over user reviews here carefully before buying. I am glad that I did not put much faith in some the critical reviews here (one of which seemed to be for an entirely different TCL product).First of all, the two HDMI input sockets in the back are clear of any obstruction, and I'm using both of them (However the user who had problems with that may have received a unit with the TV mounted loosely inside the outer console and it may have shifted during transit, making the HDMI sockets hard to plug into).Some are unhappy with the way the glass stand assembly. In my case, I found mounting the TV on its glass stand to be a breeze. I laid the TV face down on top of a bed with the stand stem hanging over the edge of the bed and mounted the base in less than 5 minutes. I had no trouble at all with the screws (however if you don't use the appropriate sized Philips screw driver, there might be problems forcing the screws in or stripping their heads). I also found the glass stand to be very stable for this unit. It is heavy glass and about 19-20 inches long and 10 inches wide (sorry, I can't find my tape measure at the moment for a more precise measurement).Additionally, one user rated this unit solely as a computer monitor and not as a TV set! Since computer monitors usually have higher resolution than TVs, there are bound to be disappointments! However, I can use the TCL LE39FHDF3300TA as extended desktop from my Dell Laptop using bluetooth, Intel WiDi software, and a Netgear Push2TV HD TV adapter (hooked up to an HDMI socket on the TV). Wow, it works wonderfully!Yes, the sound from the internal speakers is tinny, as to be expected from such a slim unit. I have mine hooked up right now to a pair of computer speakers with a woofer and it sounds great! However, I may invest in a sound bar soon.Overall, very satisfied so far and glad I didn't find all of the negative reviews useful!

Reviews.Title: What in the Tarnations is ................?
Reviews.Author: Ke'Shaun Simmons
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV on a Friday and picked one day shipping for 8.99. The item arrived via FedEx around 2.pm. I was excited, I proceeded to open the box,screw the stand (Glass) into the TV, plug it in/ and cut it on, but to no, but to no avail. The TV dosen't work, I called amazon and perfect customer service as always. They set up a refund / return, refunded me my 8.99 shipping fee and pick the tv up Monday (What a weekend) Now back to the tv. The Tv look so good even though it was defective, I purchased the 43inch TV. I hope it works AMAZON! I recommend this tv to anyone but plug it in first before wasting your time putting on the stand to verify its not defective.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Twinklelady "Book Reader"
Reviews.Content: Great 39 inch, 1080, tv.  Ordered less than a week ago from Amazon, no tax, free shipping, good price, rec'd in 4 days, easy set up, great picture, easy manual adjustment options.  Would recommend TCL brand for future shoppers.  What more can I say !  Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture and Quality
Reviews.Author: Korey C.
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. Use it all the time and it works well with my tablet. Wish it had more hdmi ports though. (Only comes with 2)

Reviews.Title: Perfect 'dumb' TV
Reviews.Author: DMcC
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this if you're looking for 3D, Apps or anything else. If you want something to connect something 'smart' (like a PS4, Apple TV, or Blu Ray player) then this is a great price and a great find. It's been almost a year since I bought this, and I've had no complaints. The image is sharp (but not too sharp), the blacks are dark when they need to be, and the colors are perfectly balanced. Great find, and I'm glad I took the risk on a reasonably less known brand.

Reviews.Title: Excellent quality for the given price!
Reviews.Author: THE DUKE
Reviews.Content: I've bought two of these TV's and am still enjoying the great picture quality along with the acceptable sound quality. Additionally, the added USB, VGA and HDMI ports make it possible for me to connect my computer, external HDD, XBox AND PS3 altogether to the TV's at the same time. The TV has pretty standard options but is definitely worth the investment.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV great warranty
Reviews.Author: Craig W. Deming "Awenwonder"
Reviews.Content: The TV is used as a large screen monitor providing 1080 P resolution, a huge improvement over the small screen I was using before. The TV had a circuit board go out on it and the manufacturer came out to my office over a year later and replaced the part at no cost for labor & parts. Great customer service, Go TCL!

Reviews.Title: Good quality for the price!
Reviews.Author: Stephen Ebel
Reviews.Content: The picture is nice, everything works like it says. The only thing keeping me from putting it 5 stars is the speakers--they work but they are pretty weak.

Reviews.Title: No problems good picture
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: The Bezel on this TV is small the picture is good. Light and simple. May not have all the bells and whistles of some other TVs but for what it is, it deserves the full four stars.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Wildtigers08
Reviews.Content: Pros: Good picture, good sound, so far pretty durable, price, the border is not so wide as to take away from the true picture size (i.e 39 inches pretty much means 39 inches of picture.Cons: Cant think of any

Reviews.Title: TLC for my TCL
Reviews.Author: Jihawna Johnson
Reviews.Content: I bought this television 2 years ago.  We loved it so much, we bought a second one.  Fast delivery, easy assembly, awesome price, and great pictures! We use one to watch television and the other as a computer monitor, it works well in both instances.  Very satisfied customer!

Reviews.Title: Great value 39inch 1080p TV
Reviews.Author: zdeptawa
Reviews.Content: Awesome 39inch 1080p LED TV! Ours does have a tiny black dot in the top left corner (could be dead pixels? not sure) but it really doesn't bother us. Got this TV for a great price and it works perfect for our bedroom. The built in speakers aren't very awesome, but that's to be expected in a TV like this.

Reviews.Title: If the voices in your head stop talking, buy this tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Katie"
Reviews.Content: This is a good budget television. I got it after someone stole my old television and use it mostly as a computer monitor. Can't beat solitaire from 20 feet.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: JKL
Reviews.Content: The image quality on this television is perfect for our small room. However the sound is horrible!!! As suggested by some, but external speakers and that should fix the problem.

Reviews.Title: Good bang for the buck...
Reviews.Author: Bill Zimmer
Reviews.Content: I'm replacing a 32" (CRT big heavy tube).Discovered I need a 43" LED 6:9 format TV to get a 34" 4:5 formated picture. I wanted at least as big of image as I had been watching. Researched the company and found it to produce a good product. The 43" receiver is easy to set up and has a good picture with the presets included. paid $419. I figure $10/inch was enough. I Wish I would have bought the 46"/ 50"/55" larger but the 43" is a GOOD buy!Comcast is my provider & with a box has 720 X 480i signal and you will need to upgrade to a box with HDMI to get 1080p signal that is sharp enough to fill the complete screen with a HD quality picture from any 1080p source which the TV is equipped with many inputs including USB for you snap shots.This set has a great picture and good sound. Good value!

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture, thin edge and sleek design, mediocre sound, all in all more than satisfied for this price
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: picture is absolutely beautiful, black level is pretty good as well, sound is mediocre as expected but i paired it with Cyber Acoustics Subwoofer Satellite System (CA-3602a), which makes it pretty perfect, for me.  Cyber Acoustics Subwoofer Satellite CA 3602a

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: It's a great TV for a great price and no problems at all with the product or with the shipment.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: usconstlvr
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV and easy to set up.  The price was comparable to even WalMart so being able to have to delivered right to my home was a plus.  Works great and the color is just awesome and there a lot of features that surprised me.  I would definitely buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Tyler
Reviews.Content: I bought this model and found it was DOA. I worked with Amazon and got a replacement in 3 days. It has worked great with no issues ever since. I would recommend this for anyone who has a small budget, but would like a great quality TV.PROS:*Great 1080P Quality, currently have my PC and PS3 hooked into it. The quality is very good.*Price is very good for the size of TV*Very nice designCONS:*Sound quality is pretty bad, without by sound bar it would be extremely quiet.*First TV came DOA, the 2nd had an issue with the back light automatically turning off. I worked with Amazon and TCL support and found turning off the Light sensor and Dynamic backlight resolved it.Other than a few initial issues with the TV, I am pleased with the product. It does everything I need it to, and it was extremely cheap. I would recommend TCL and will but another TV from them in the future.

Reviews.Title: works fine
Reviews.Author: kevin roan
Reviews.Content: It works good but is hard to find a Comcast code to program the remote for the Comcast cable box and tv

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: James Edwards
Reviews.Content: Exceptional value exceptional picture. Purchase was easy, handled promptly. I will definitely purchase again in the future. Thank you very much!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Craig Crim
Reviews.Content: Great picture, works wonderfully. This was one of the lowered priced units, but the quality seems just as well as the main competitors.

Reviews.Title: MAN CAVE COMPLETE!!!
Reviews.Author: cubs win 1
Reviews.Content: Using this as a wall mounted secondary tv in the "man cave". I actually purchased two of these so that I now have three tv's hooked up to satellite and can watch three games at once. The picture is great and would definitely recommend this product!!!

Reviews.Title: Not bad at all!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "dispor"
Reviews.Content: Very very pleased with this TV.  The sound sucks, but if you've already got a sound system, then no worries!  We use it with our apple TV and the occasional video game.  It's perfect.  (yes the black levels are a little weak, but for the price, it's awesome!)

Reviews.Title: Nice Picture but..........
Reviews.Author: Fred in Philly
Reviews.Content: Its got a good picture and the remote has easy access features. Even though the tv is so new, there aren't codes for my directv remote to program. The tv has a function that allows it to respond my Directv remote. The only knock on it I can think of, is the fact that it lacks enough imputs. With so many devices having simular outputs, it lacks a s-video,more than one rca componet, audio video and so one. You might have to buy adapters to use all your entertainment devices. Still... its a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Cathy Fisher
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tv because it was the largest that would fit in my tv cabinet.  What a surprise that it is really a great tv.  Wish I had room for a larger one. I would order it as well.

Reviews.Title: Input selector freezes @ USB option.
Reviews.Author: C. Morris Jr. "Open Mind"
Reviews.Content: I Have to unplug to reboot TV to allow other input options.It's a problem which there tech support says their is no firmware fix yet.Picture quality is fantastic for a value HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Worth more than it's price!
Reviews.Author: Marcel
Reviews.Content: This TV is worth way more than it's price. Some other reviewer that the difference between this TV and other LG TV's is the brand, but the factories used to make them are the same... I confirm this, the quality of this television is great.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money!!
Reviews.Author: Richard S.
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for our master bed room.  I use it with Verizon FIOS and the picture is great, the sound is loud enough.  I have had it for about a year now and it has worked as advertised.  Good color!!!

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: D. Yoder "dly"
Reviews.Content: Have had no issues with this TV and it was very easy to set up...the .screen quality is good too

Reviews.Title: Great 2nd TV!
Reviews.Author: Zeemmarax
Reviews.Content: I picked up a 39 inch TCL for my study early May and so far so good. I wanted to wait and see a bit before reviewing it to make sure it wouldn't randomly die or some other factory defect. We used to have a 42' Samsung(with built-in side mounted speakers making it wing out) in the study but it was a little to big for the space and we just really wanted something  a bit smaller yet not to much smaller. After looking at a few Vizio and Samsung 32' & 34' I came across this guy. I was skeptical at first since I didn't know anything about TCL till then. After some research they seemed like an ok company so I took a chance.Lucky for me that chance panned out nicely. It came in a sturdy box padded on all sides and felt completely protected. The TV fits perfectly where we needed it to be. While not perfect I have to say it is worth every penny so far. The picture it self is great with some deep colors for what it is and the speakers are modest and won't wow you. My main complaint is screen uniformity. This is a problem that affects nearly every company of LCD/LED TVs. My previous Samsung had it, my 60' Vizio has trouble with it in the bottom right corner, and over all is something I would love to see more ironed out from all brands. Is it going to just kill your viewing experience? No, not for me especially when you consider this is a secondary TV. Yet it might bother some of the videophiles out there. I whole heartily recommend this TV to anyone looking for a nice 2nd screen or someone who needs a good one on a tighter budget.Overall:Pros: Great picture quality! Decent remote overall. Low profile bezel. Cheap in price not in quality!Cons: Screen uniformity. Speakers are modest. Glass stand(This is a con for me, you might like it though).

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: idaguy
Reviews.Content: I bought the 43" early 2013 from Amazon. Product shipped FedX and I had the television in 2 days.For starts, I reviewed a lot of televisions on Amazon; also, I visited a few stores and compared 39" televisions to sizes slightly larger. Good idea as my wall is high/ wide. A 39" would have been a mistake giver the wall field. So, I settled on the 43" TCL.I noticed the 43" on the Amazon websites view, bottom right, that there is a "light on / off indicator" that protrudes...my 43" television appears like the 39" pics same location. The TV I have has a manufacturing date of May/ 2012.I am very impressed with the quality of TCL. I did not search for dead pixels as a few television reviewers do. The TCL 43" viewing experience is excellent, deep color saturation, sharp views. My house faces South, has a lot of glass...glare is minimal, not a problem at all! I did not change any of the factory presets.The sound...I do not know why a few people complain about the sound. The sound is very good! Maybe TCL improved the sound features.I have DirecTV as my provider. If you look at the other TCL reviews, it is a lengthy pain to coordinate with DirecTV to get your TCL television to work on the DirecTV remote. I tried the DirecTV route...gave up after a few tries. I "Googled" and found "TCL Television + DirecTV Remote" [...] My DirecTV remote is "RC64" and the RCA code "11547″ was the one I needed. The only issue is that I have to use the TCL remote to shut the television itself off.After reviewing other comments about sound, I just attached a "Creative Labs I-Trigue 3330 2.1 Multimedia Speaker System", that was not in use, into the "audio" jack on the back left side and that simple little "cheap" fix of 2 satellite speakers & subwoofer really improved the sound. I think any cheap speaker system should help a lot.I use my television in the "traditional" way, just normal broadcasting. I did purchase the 2 meter long "AmazonBasics High-Speed HDMI Cable", but I have not the occasion to utilize You- Tube with the T.V.***rev.Aug8  Took the opportunity to view You- Tube via the HDMI cable. Must say that HD movies are an eye- opener on the 43"...colors true, details very sharp. There is a very slight lag in fast 'action' scenes, understandably given the television and computers 60hz output.

Reviews.Title: Great buy for the price.
Reviews.Author: yetanotherstephanie
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this to go in our bedroom for Mother's Day. I'm not sure if this would impress any hardcore technophiles, but as a secondary TV, we don't have any complaints. We were able to hook up cable & the TiVo without problems. The sleep timer works well, captioning is easy to turn on/off, and there's a handy setting to adjust picture between watching in a room with or without lights on. The only thing I can think of that might bother some people is the lag time between turning it on/off--I'm not sure what causes it, but it takes a full 10-15 seconds before responding--and the audio output isn't as strong as it is on our other TVs; I keep the volume set at 60-75% when our other TVs are normally at about 25%.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Linnbo78
Reviews.Content: Have been really pleased with it from the sizeOf the screen because of the small border around it to the quality of the picture. Real impressed with the price and free shipping plus 2 yr warranty.And that tlc has some ties with Samsung

Reviews.Title: I like this TV
Reviews.Author: matthew Wohn
Reviews.Content: IT WAS A GREAT TV AND I LOVE IT! I LIKE THE VISUAL QUALITY AND SOUND. PRETTY NIFTY IF I DO SAY SO MYSELF.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: -Isaiah 54 Teacher-
Reviews.Content: Once I used an HDMI cable.  I'm not a techie when it comes to TV I just wanted something affordable with good picture quality.  I got what I wanted.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Pour pic quality
Reviews.Author: Cabo Grupo
Reviews.Content: Price is low, picture quality the same, low.Picture is not crystal clear.We're bought this screen for a room we remodel.By the time we open the box and find out pour quality, it was to late to return.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for someone on a budget!
Reviews.Author: Dani Bomgardner
Reviews.Content: I had a tech/electronic wizard friend look at tv's before I bought one within my limited budget and he recommended this one.I like it, and have had no issues with it. The color is very nice and vivid. The screen is the perfect size (I am about 10 feet away on my couch.) The sound is great. I like all of the different options it gives you to change which viewing mode your in depending on what you're watching.I would recommend this to someone who doesn't need a giant tv, has a small apartment but has friends over to watch things, and is on a tighter budget.

Reviews.Title: Good price Good picture
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: Picture looks good, easy to use. Set up for the base could of been easier but otherwise I'm happy with it

Reviews.Title: Good for the price.
Reviews.Author: RICK
Reviews.Content: We like it.  Nice picture and easy to set up and use.  Perhaps the worse sound I've heard on a tv; but, I wasn't buying a stereo so that's ok.

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Eileen Ward
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV when my LG of only one year stopped working.  I was told the screen was bad.  This TV so far is perfect.  The color is great and the price I paid was about $299.  I also love the 2 year warranty which LG did not have.  The LG was my son's TV and he has taken over the TCL TV, so I ordered another one for myself.  Also, it is so light weight.

Reviews.Title: A Great TV for a super low price!
Reviews.Author: PowerBuyer
Reviews.Content: Pros-Great picture-Good color/sound controls-Has a built-in TV Tuner so you can watch free TV in HD, you just need an antenna. I got my antenna for $10 at Family Dollar.Cons-It takes too long to warm up when you turn it on-The sound kinda sucks, so you'll want to get a soundbar at some point. However, if you're not an audiophile, you won't even care about it.-The picture is great but you have to be at least 10-12 feet away or you'll get the screen door effect which will make the picture seem lower quality. So if your living room is too small or you have sight issues that force you to be closer to your TV, this is NOT the TV for you.-Refresh rate is 60Hz and will take a bit of time to get used to if you're accustomed to a faster refresh rate.Overall/SummaryI got this TV for $279. This was a GREAT buy. The picture quality is STUNNING. Yes, the sound is not great and there are some other little issues as discussed above. But, for the price it is you're getting incredible value. It's beyond worth it.If you're on the fence, listen: BUY IT!

Reviews.Title: Never heard of it but it works great!
Reviews.Author: Sigdaddy
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this purchase and though I never heard of this namebrand, it works great for the kids room and they are thrilled to have a good TV too!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Dwhite
Reviews.Content: Unbeatable for the price!! I saw some negative reviews of the sound but I found it to be more than sufficient.

Reviews.Title: Great value & functionality
Reviews.Author: George Yeh
Reviews.Content: A visually superior display product than my 32" Element LCD TV.  No over scan problem with hooking up to PCs via the HDMI port.  Adequate sound with built-in speakers.  Pretty good for an inexpensive, no name brand.

Reviews.Title: Great for price
Reviews.Author: jillbarry
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the price, good picture, good sound. I'm just an ordinary user, no big symphonic sound need.  Perfect  for my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: a great tv the best i've ever bought.thankyou amazon for making it possible
Reviews.Author: lenora
Reviews.Content: very clear picture and just the right size for the bed room. I enjoy this tv a lot. I haven't put it on my wall et but it's here..

Reviews.Title: TCL 32-inch TV
Reviews.Author: Aurora
Reviews.Content: Set up was easy, performance is good, no problems. Recommend for smaller needs where super big screen not needed. Good value..

Reviews.Title: So far great
Reviews.Author: Matio
Reviews.Content: It's been about one month that I have this product and truly everything is great with this TV. With this price, it is really great to have this TV.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: C. Cook
Reviews.Content: First TV that came was clearly used.  Called Amazon and they immediately sent a new one.  The new one works great and looks great.  If I had paid a lot more I might not be so thrilled with it.  For the price it is a great TV.

Reviews.Title: Great portable small group setting display
Reviews.Author: KC
Reviews.Content: This HDTV is primary used as a extended computer monitor for small group meetings.  Love the portability and clear video.

Reviews.Title: Other LED TV's charge for 2 year warranties.  This one includes the extended warranty free.
Reviews.Author: Jim Cye
Reviews.Content: I have 3 TCL TV's now.  Purchased these 2, 39" ones to use with my security camera system.  They are lightweight, clear, sharge and inexpensive.  My 48" TCL was my first of this brand, used in my mbdrm and was happy with it so I stuck to this brand when it came in under $300 bucks.

Reviews.Title: Sound is not great
Reviews.Author: Robert Vitale
Reviews.Content: Picture is very good, installation a breeze, but the sound quality is poor but I'll live with it. Have had better speakers on smaller, cheaper, TV's. The sound adjustments cannot remedy the tinniness of the output. Slightly better speakers would have made it a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the price
Reviews.Author: VG
Reviews.Content: The shipment arrived in time.Pros:The TV was very easy to install. Picture quality was excellent.I am using without cable box (direct from wall).Worked just fine and get very good HD picture quality from local channels.Cons:I did not see audio output from the TV which I generally use to direct TV audio to my HT systemTV speakers are not so great and the screen is shiny.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied costumer.
Reviews.Author: byron
Reviews.Content: The picture quality on this tv is on pair with my samsung smart tv, that should say a lot about it.I would recommend this tv as a bedroom set saying that, the low quality bass shouldn't be a problem.overall a great buy, great value and a 2 year warranty to go along with it couldn't be more satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV
Reviews.Author: Tresea O. Land
Reviews.Content: This TV is a very good one and priced right. Got it for my mother for mother's day and she really likes it.

Reviews.Title: picture perfect
Reviews.Author: Brenda Hinrichs
Reviews.Content: Very sleek design. the picture and sound are amazing. It also arrived before the estimated delivery date. I wan't familiar with this brand so was not sure  what to expect. I was greatly suprised with the quality.

Reviews.Title: TCL
Reviews.Author: lacretia   nelson
Reviews.Content: Nice and sleek love this Brand it is a perfect fit for the space in my house my guest love it

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Sean Mac
Reviews.Content: I have had it for a month or two now and I am impressed. I use it for playing ps3 and it has a very crisp picture. Hopefully it doesn't burn out like some of those that others had.

Reviews.Title: you can't beat it
Reviews.Author: ajc
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my new apartment because I didn't want to spend a lot but I wanted a decent tv. I read all the reviews and most of them were great. What I got was a great tv.  On top of that it comes with a two year warranty.  As far as the reviews saying the base was hard to put on it really wasn't that hard just took a little effort.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV - excellent value
Reviews.Author: Jacob Lee "Gr84caster"
Reviews.Content: Bought this to replace an old Tube TV and it has a great picture, nice sound, and cannot be beat for the money.  I'd recommend it to anyone - excellent warranty as well.

Reviews.Title: Picture and sound
Reviews.Author: Dybbuk
Reviews.Content: Hookup was easy...The Picture is excellent....The sound as it comes from the set itself sucks...I think I have to add speakers/

Reviews.Title: nice flat screen
Reviews.Author: Velle187
Reviews.Content: Nice slim flat screen picture great and all features high definition media thinking of getting another but larger size than the 32in

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: cgarrett
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture. I put in bedroom with new Direct TV subscription. HD channels are amazing! Only drawback is the sound is a little tinny, Volume doesn't get real loud. Perfect for a small room, Though.

Reviews.Title: Very impressed for the price
Reviews.Author: LAWRENCE P LILLY
Reviews.Content: Easy setup.  Good picture and most importantly for me; the sound quality is much crisper then the Sony Bravo that it replaced with the larger down facing speakers.  I can finally understand the dialog while watching movies. Very happy with purchased.  This TCL appears to be designed with a lot of TLC.  Best value out there IMO.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV!
Reviews.Author: Sue, E.G., R.I.
Reviews.Content: Just set up my new TCL 39" HD TV. Was a bit concerned when attaching the stand...really poor quality and difficult to assemble. But, once connected to the cable provider (Verizon fios) and was able to check out the picture...WOW!! This TV delivers a better quality picture than my Mom's Sony HD and Samsung HD!! I am so impressed by the picture quality. I could not be happier!!I read all of the reviews before making this purchase... pro vs con: pro wins!!I paid $279.00 for an amazing 39" HD TV!!

Reviews.Title: Works great, dish remote doesn't work on it
Reviews.Author: bluesnacks
Reviews.Content: TV works great but it came with a large scratch on the screen and it doesn't work with dish remote.Other than that the picture quality is great for TV and games, even PC games. The speakers work nicely.

Reviews.Title: great value for 39 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Michael H Jacobson
Reviews.Content: I bought the TCL LE39FHDF3300TA for $279.99 after Amazon twice matched their online price that had dropped within 14 days of my purchase.The picture quality is great for the price.  There are many setting to adjust the picture attributes and many defined settings such as"sports", "cinema", etc.  If you compare this TV next to the most expensive Samsung it will not be as good, but the difference is not extreme, but just incremental.The sound quality is not very good, but you can always add auxiliary speakers.Overall, I am very happy with this TV.  At this price, you can not beat the deal.

Reviews.Title: Phenomenal Clarity For The Price!
Reviews.Author: Jmotyka
Reviews.Content: I consider myself a technology GURU. I've been building computers and tinkering with electronics since i was a pre-teen. But i also cannot afford to purchase every toy i like. So when i needed a TV i did alot of searching, and i mean alot. Now all this talk about 120hz and 240hz being a necessity in a tv is a bunch of bull, you really are not going to notice a difference unless your constantly looking/expecting to see a difference in the TV's performance. I know that i can tell the difference while watching a hockey or football game but its very minimal and doesn't bother me enough to spend an extra 200-400 dollars for higher refresh rate. This TV literally surpassed my expectations more than i imagine. I have seen TV's like Seiki and Westinghouse that were god awful and for this TV to be in the same price bracket i figured i wasn't going to see amazing quality, I WAS WRONG! The colors are accurate, i dont see any light bleeding and the one thing i thought i was going to hate were the black levels but they are phenomenal. I dont understand how they were able to make this TV with this amount of quality for such a ridiculous low price. BRAVO TCL! BRAVO!My only gripe is i wish i had at least one more HDMI Input. But its not a deal breaker at all.For all you people complaining about audio quality........COME AND WAKE THE **** UP! Every new LED TV's sound is going to be inadequate even if you spend $2000 on your TV there is just no way your going to get Great sound out of a 2-3 inch speaker. JUST NOT HAPPENING!!I Have a Yamaha 6.1 Receiver, 2 8inch Yamaha Bookshelf Speakers, 1 klipsch synergy center channel, 1 Mirage Audio 8inch subwoofer, and 2 cerwin vega surround sound speakers, so my man cave is.....well a man cave. I watched both iron man blurays last night and had a smile from ear to ear.Thanx AMAZON and TCL! PS if would like someone to review your products id be more than glad to.

Reviews.Title: excellent value
Reviews.Author: Gary A. Woodward
Reviews.Content: arrived in well packaged box.  great looking.  great picture.  sound is a little tinny-but what do youexpect for 279.00?  plugged in an android pc stick with wireless keyboard have a smart tv for 300.00

Reviews.Title: Maybe they're all like this now, but...
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: This thing is awesome. Black blacks, bright, realistic colors. It might not have a little computer built in, but it's got an HDMI port and that's all I wanted. You really can't go wrong for three hundred bucks. It's every bit as good as I remember my old trinitron CRT being. LCDs have come a long way.

Reviews.Title: Sweet TV/monitor for the price
Reviews.Author: TriAg
Reviews.Content: Primary Use:  I purchased this tv several weeks and am using it as a monitor for the computer.  The picture quality is great.  I am using the HDMI connection and my computer picked it up from the start.  Love it.When I first pulled it out of the box I connected it to the cable and the quality of the picture was very nice.  The sound coming from the tv was probably ok for a bedroom.  You would definitely want a soundbar or other sound system for quality audio.If you read the review from "papaphilya", they provide good info about the design of the tv.I would definitely suggest this tv (monitor) to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Excelente calidad de imagen
Reviews.Author: Richard Boscan
Reviews.Content: Excelente Hdtv Led 32, excelente imagen, buena calidad de sonido... Una segunda entrada componente no hubiera sido pedir mucho, igualmente la reproducción de video por usb (solo reproduce audio), pero las 2 entradas Hdmi compensan con creces. Tenia mis dudas con respecto a la marca, ahora la recomiendo totalmente debido a la relación costo/beneficio que es excelente.Excellent Hdtv Led 32, great picture, good sound quality ... A second input component would have been asking a lot, also video playback via USB (plays audio only), but the 2 Hdmi inputs outweigh. I had my doubts about the brand, now fully recommend due to cost / benefit ratio is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Great picture ! Great Price !
Reviews.Author: Christopher Breed
Reviews.Content: I've had my TCL 39" for about 4 weeks. It has a bright, clear and vivid picture. LED's light the screen evenly, no dark areas. Remote is user friendly. Only complaint, it only has 2 HDMI inputs and I need 3. Though 2  is very common it seems these days. Very pleased with my purchase. Very pleased with Amazon's great service !

Reviews.Title: Best TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Jilana Windsor
Reviews.Content: I got this new LED as it has outdated the old LCD screens. What do I know about all that. Well not a lot but I did take a chance but I had a budget and had to get a low price. i have not been disappointed. The direction booklet is easily understandable and not too Chinese or foreign that it is unnavigable. The set up and all putting together went well for any set up you have. I heard it was a Samsung screen underneath; I woudn't doubt it. I'm watching old tv shows and see things in old programs that I've seen more than 20 times and so much is new because I can see it.This is by far the best high quality new technology tv for the price as is out there anywhere. If you got the few hundred buy this set and save yourself some big money and be in the new tech tv game.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal For The Money
Reviews.Author: Niko
Reviews.Content: The set is a steal for under 350 dollars for a 39 inch unit. Physical craftsmenship is great, the digital tv tuner leaves somethings to be desired. As for hdmi picture quality and the rest of it is wonderfull. Couldn't be happier with this tv, so for all you out there on the fence about this one take the plunge and buy it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent combination in very lowest price
Reviews.Author: Umesh Padture
Reviews.Content: I like this TV as compred to the price I got it. The picture quality is ok. Sound quality is very good and feasure are usefriendly. Over all good TV.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Ed Engle
Reviews.Content: You will not find a better value for the money.  Great picture.  My son bought this TV last year and we bought one as well because of the great quality for the price

Reviews.Title: nice tv
Reviews.Author: manfromars
Reviews.Content: ver good nice tv thank yu much ok ok ok ok ok ok ok o k ok ok ok ok k ok

Reviews.Title: No complaints so far.
Reviews.Author: Ted Welch
Reviews.Content: Works as expected based on other reviews.  Speakers aren't that great, but I would think they are comparable to other units in this price range.  I can hear well enough that I haven't hooked up my meager RCA home entertainment system yet.  I just have to turn the volume up higher than I normally would, like to 80% or so.

Reviews.Title: The perfect TV for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: Sunny Morning
Reviews.Content: It is mounted on the wall and makes for great TV viewing just as I am about to fall asleep.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Obstacle
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV just days before Christmas for an unbelievably low price and could not be more pleased with the purchase.  We use this set in the master bedroom and have found it to be attractive with great viewing angles and very nice picture quality.  We have the 43" TCL LED and the picture quality is no less impressive than our name brand Panansonic L42E50 (42") that we also purchased from Amazon two weeks earlier to use in the den.

Reviews.Title: Awsome tv!
Reviews.Author: Big Dawg Buyer
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv taking a huge chance because i know nothing about tcl. I am so glad I did! Picture is awsome! i got this for around $330 and the competitors were all around 500 and up for the same 43 inch. Highly recomend this tv even at a comparable price to others.

Reviews.Title: Quite a deal
Reviews.Author: A. Eskenazi
Reviews.Content: Picture is extra fine. As others have noted, the sound is ordinary. But that's no problem as I have an extra computer speaker system attached that makes all OK. Considering that the final price, with seasonal discounts, came out to under $300, this is a super great deal.Very happy so far ...AE

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: C. Todd "carcar"
Reviews.Content: I don't write many reviews but this is a good tv.  I bought on sale from Amazon on 12/22/12 in the afternoon and it arrived Christmas Eve with free shipping.  You can't beat that.  I wasn't expecting it before Christmas.  I had been looking at it for a while and it (the 43'') went on sale so I bought it.  I initially used the glass stand which was fine but I have since mounted it to the wall in the bedroom.  Nice picture...the commericials are still louder with the feature turned on that is suppose to keep the commericial volume the same as other programming.  All in all a nice tv especially if you can get it on sale.

Reviews.Title: Excellent HDTV
Reviews.Author: breynolds
Reviews.Content: This 43-inch HDTV works great.  Excellent picture, good sound.  This is my second TCL purchased, I bought a 48-inch prior to the 43 inch.  I put one in my office and the other in the master bedroom.  So far so good.  I bought them last year 2012.  They only have two HDMI ports, but for me thats all I needed.  I also liked the 2 year limited warranty, most sets I looked at only had a one year warranty.  Excellent product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: videonut
Reviews.Content: TCL ("the creative life") is the largest TV manufacturer in China; this is my first buy out of curiosity over 6 months ago, used mainly as a computer monitor via HDMI.Pros: good value, good over air reception when used with powered antenna in my area (large brick house in shaker heights, ohio), good resolution ( I can't tell the difference 720p and 1080p in a 32" screen).  Available picture adjustments make it a good monitor as well.Cons: no adjustment in base.  Viewing angle (esp vertical) is limited so this disadvantage is real.  Can be solved with minor creative engineering, however.

Reviews.Title: TCL TV
Reviews.Author: Lynette Bird
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with this TV - color and clarity are good.  This one works well for our needs.

Reviews.Title: TCL
Reviews.Author: Kent Harrison
Reviews.Content: I've only had this TV for a few days, but so far I am impressed.  The picture is great and the size is perfect for my needs.  I use it in a bedroom. The screen is so much larger and brighter than the 32" Vizio lcd  that it replaced.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Dean Q. Johnson
Reviews.Content: We 'cut the cord' a while back... Needed a good tv for dvd and OTA....Arrived in good packaging ... Easy to attach stand....Picture is good with ROKU

Reviews.Title: TCL 39" Flat screen LED
Reviews.Author: Allison in NC
Reviews.Content: I know its made in China, but its a great tv. Easy setup. Works perfectly. We have it in our bedroom where we love to watch TV at night. Picture is great. Have no problems with it. Great tv at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Worth the price
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have been putting off buying a TV for the 2 years that we've been married. We just don't watch cable. But with a baby on the way, and my wife staying home much more during the day - we wanted to give her an easy way to watch some local stations, movies, & netflix.I had been watching the TCL brand for awhile. In general I'm against buying no-name brands, but TCL seems to be shoving into the competitor's playing field. Supposedly Samsung makes the internal components and TCL puts a casing around them.Pros- The picture is great for me! Great clarity and 1080.- Menu is simple- Remote is laid out fairly well- Lots of input/output options- TV has a sleep function. Don't see that too often.- TV turned off automatically after we finished watching a movie. I was too lazy to go grab the remote and turn it off right away. After 5 or 10 minutes with the BluRay turned off, the TV turned off as well (it warned me first). I like that option.Cons- Remote is all black, buttons aren't color coded to group similar functions together- Internal speakers absolutely suck! Other people are not kidding. In general TV's this thin don't have great sound, but this is below average. Plan on buying a sound bar or hooking up to surround sound. I have a surround system, but the receiver currently is broken - so we're temporarily stuck with crackling speakers. (good thing we don't watch much television).- Dislike that HDMI has input on the side, cord shows off to the side a little bit - rather than coming straight out the bottom- No wifi or apps. I wasn't willing to spend a few hundred more for these features. I already have a Samsung BluRay that does these things, so I'm okay with the TV not doing it.Overall it's a great price. If you're willing to get a sound bar (can get basic ones for under $100) then this would be a great option for most people.

Reviews.Title: Great price, decent quality, overall impressed
Reviews.Author: K. Shira "elegirl"
Reviews.Content: I was in dire need of a tv, but low on funds.  This unit fit the bill and had great reviews, so I thought I'd try it.  Overall, very impressed with the cosmetic look of the unit.  Easy to install and a quality picture, however, it's no plasma.  If you don't have a home theater unit or soundbar you will definitely need one to suppliment the sound.

Reviews.Title: New faith in "off brand"
Reviews.Author: D. Campbell
Reviews.Content: Yes this is an off brand tv in my mind but after reading the reviews it was worth the risk to give this one a try. The negative reviews seems to be that they just received a individual lemon and does not reflect the entire line. You can receive a lemon from any manufacture, even Samsung. This tv is beautiful even when the signal is below 1080p. Amazon will take care of you if you get a lemon, but like I said, it could be the same chance with any brand.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Adipatus Sutapida
Reviews.Content: I've had this tv for two months and have had no problems with it. It's light, so I easily mounted it on my wall. Consumes less power. HD. LED. Looks good, sounds good. Not expensive, 42". I watch tv and use it as a computer monitor with no issues. No dead pixels.I love the fact that the frame above and to the sides is thin: some 12 mm in width. At the bottom it's one inch. No light seepage (just an iddy bit.

Reviews.Title: Arrived early
Reviews.Author: Laxscout
Reviews.Content: Came a day early from USA to Canada...who could complain?Perfect for what I needed, no complaints here from me

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Alan L. Pierce
Reviews.Content: Ultra thin frame, so this 39" sceen fits in my ent. center that should only fit 32".Glass base gives it a more upscale look. Picture quality very good, good connectivity options. Sound is ok. Would recommend sound system for home theatre use, but fine for bedroom viewing.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv, Nice HD picture best tv for the money.
Reviews.Author: Vennf78
Reviews.Content: I boutgh this tv about 2 months Ago, And we have been very happy with it, It has nice picture and great sound, We love the 2 Year warranty from tcl, best tv for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: This TV has exceeded my expectations. No complaints with sound quality or picture.Solid deal, and best value found in 2 months of comparison shopping.

Reviews.Title: TCL 43" LED TV
Reviews.Author: Sereyroth Uk
Reviews.Content: Received in very good condition. No problem in setting up.Picture is better than expected for this low cost TV. So far it is working great but I only owned it for 1 month.It is kind of weird power on/off indication: power LED light is on when the TV is off and off when the TV is on.

Reviews.Title: jorvi marin
Reviews.Author: jorvi marin
Reviews.Content: muy buen producto con muy buena calidad de imagen y resolucion de video gracias por el producto vendido . ?

Reviews.Title: TCL 43 LED
Reviews.Author: Gary Kacal
Reviews.Content: Price was right for this TV!! Picture is great (HD). Sound not too good, but OK. Easy to hook up.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Paul Ferris
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is awesome.  I bought the unit on sale and could not beat it for value.  Sound isn't the best, but I planned on augmenting that anyway.

Reviews.Title: For the price this is a 5 star item.
Reviews.Author: TigerXtrme69
Reviews.Content: There's a couple things not perfect about this tv. The audio out options leave a little something to be desired as I can't use just the television speakers when my surround sound is playing something else. The stand is a joke and feels very wobbly but it isn't ever touched in my place so I'm not worried about it because of that. If I had kids or a dog or something this would be a problem. The stand looks nice however. The picture is great. I hate the look of 120hz so I wanted 60hz so that's not a problem for me. This tv was dirt cheap as well and honestly the problems are pretty nit-picky so this is an easy 5 stars from me. If this thing breaks sometime in the next couple years I will update. Otherwise I'd recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Super Sharp Picture and Sound
Reviews.Author: RICHARD
Reviews.Content: This TV is Great i have a TCL 32" and its Super on 24/7 and picture is sharp sound is super so i bout a 43" and you know what ,the picture is sharp and the sound is great what more can you ask for all i hope is it last a long time ,TCL is a great TV so far .

Reviews.Title: A very good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: D. Berry
Reviews.Content: This was a good purchase. The price is less than I paid for a stereo, 27" tube TV in 1990. Picture quality is good after fussing with the controls and realizing that different inputs can need different settings. Sometimes there's a washed out, over exposed quality to some over the air broadcast programs. But other programs on the same station have robust color. Netflix and Hulu streams look consistently good.One thing about the base. It looks very nice but the screws were very difficult to get in, and one would not go all the way so I left it out. It's plenty strong without it, but take care when attaching.

Reviews.Title: What I expected!
Reviews.Author: Gil Osuna
Reviews.Content: Just what I expected, great HD LED TV with a glass stand and with cheap control remote. I have had it for 4 months and it is still working fine, I cannot complain especially because of the price.Pros:Price (When I bought it was $350)1080p Picture QualityFrame sides are thin, TV looks pro!Neutral:Remote Control, works fine but looks and feels cheap.Cons:Sound, speakers have low volumeGlass Stand, it was a pain to install mine, might be dangerous if you drop/hit TV

Reviews.Title: Love this tv
Reviews.Author: Lucy
Reviews.Content: This tv is very clear and thin. Sound is good too.  The screws are a little loose. The tv itself has good quality and looks nice

Reviews.Title: I can see stuff again.
Reviews.Author: Jason Norbury
Reviews.Content: I am no Video expert, but the contrast between my prior, aged TV and this model is literally night and day. I can see dark scenes, light scenes, it does a pretty good job of displaying live sports, and makes watching movies pleasurable again.My only complaint is there aren't enough HDMI ports (only 2), and that there was little to no documentation on the various AV inputs and outputs before I got the set.  For the record, 2 HDMI ports (one can come from a DVI cable), an RCA connection, a component connection (though you can't use both simultaneously, because it shares the audio jacks), and a digital coaxial audio out.This isn't really enough ports for the TV to be the center of your home theater, and I would strongly recommend you use an AV receiver in conjunction with this.  My AV receiver is old and still works, but my next purchase will be a newer model receiver to really allow easy use of the TV.Also, this brand is new enough in this country that most universal remotes (specifically from Time Warner Cable) don't work on the TV.  But the picture is good, and I can see dark stuff again, so I am very happy.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful, nice TV
Reviews.Author: J. Isaacson
Reviews.Content: Its so pretty I love looking at it. (Oh wait, it's a TV.) I love the slim edges, the crystal base is nice and it doesn't have any flimsy or plastic-looking edges.

Reviews.Title: Picture is great sound is good
Reviews.Author: CKM
Reviews.Content: This TV has met my every expectation...picture is great and the sound is good. Anybody not happy with the sound will only be happy with a full surround system, a TV in this price range will never give you that.I paid $311 a couple weeks ago...smoking deal for a 43"

Reviews.Title: TERRIBLE SOUND SYSTEM....LIKE A TINNEY 50'S RADIO!!!!  NO WAY TO ADJUST BASS TO TREBLE!!!
Reviews.Author: Geno Florida
Reviews.Content: Great Picture....INPUTS AND OUTPUTS ADEQUATE....NOT AS THIN AS SOME OTHER BRANDS...SEEMS TO WEIGH A LITTLE MORE THAN OTHER S ON THE MARKET. THESE ARE SOME OF THE DISADVATAGE OF BUYING SIGHT UNSEEN.  WOULD RETURN FOR BAD SOUND SYSTEM BUT IT'S TO MUCH TROUBLE!!!!

Reviews.Title: I am happy with this product
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this product I ordered during year-end 2012. TCL has been one of the top 3 LED TV producers in China. I noticed negative comment on this product, all I can say, I am lucky, I like this one.

Reviews.Title: Good quality, some issue with VGA resolution
Reviews.Author: Robin
Reviews.Content: Sound and picture are fairly good, better than the Haier 46'  I bought a month ago. Took me some time to get the screw tight in the stand. Firm remote button, maybe a little bit stiff.I connect my laptop through VGA port, and the max resolution is only 1368*1024, not 1920*1080. I tried the method provide by another user, it still doesn't work. Maybe I have to get a hdmi cable.Other than that, so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Mike Massey
Reviews.Content: We have this TV in our game room and it is great. Picture quality is excellent. I had never bought a TV online and was a little hesitant. No more.

Reviews.Title: Best Value
Reviews.Author: J. Lockwood
