Reviews.Content: I saw a TCL brand tv at Sam's Club so I knew the picture was good compared to big name brands, then did some online research.  I bought the TCL 43 inch LED model with my wife's Amazon Prime account and it was delivered Dec 24.  So far it has been a great family Christmas present.  It doesn't have quite as many bells and whistles(like only one audio out connection) as some of the big name brands, but it has everything we were looking for.  The stand does not swivel but that has not been an issue as the picture is great from any angle in our living room.  This TCL has better built in sound than our 32 inch Philips LED TV .  I hooked up our Phillips CSS2123BF/7 sound bar and our Sony Blu Ray player BDP-S580 with no trouble.  I only refered to the quick start guide to put the base together, I have not needed the manual.  We watched the newest Batman movie in HD from Amazon videos and the picture was excellent.  We looked at some pictures on a thumb drive plugged in the TCL's USB port and had no trouble at all running a slide show.  My only question will be durability and how well the warranty works if we have a break down.  The value we got for our money makes me give it a 5 rating.

Reviews.Title: Good tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Robin
Reviews.Content: Was not much confident in this not so well known name brand, but I am quite happy with the purchase. This tv meets all my needs, audio is much better than I thought it would be, same as the picture quality. This tv replaced a smaller LG 32" and I can't notice right off hand any major difference in thier performance.

Reviews.Title: Great bang for the $$$$
Reviews.Author: David O. Davis
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and the picture is a good one.  I found the RCA codes allowed me to program the remote with my Direct TV system.  I am pleased with the product and very pleased with the purchase.  However, sometimes it necessary to change the dpi from 720 to 1080 by clicking the resolution button on the receiver.  This could be an issue with the Direct TV receiver.  I doubt it would happen with an HD cable provider.  This was a great find on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Terps8
Reviews.Content: Received and set up the TV today. hardware for the stand is low quality. Stripped a screw during set up.Overall I'm pleased so far for $311.00 can't complain to much. The one issue i have is the viewing angle. I'm using this in a bedroom on an armoire. its not that high but washes out when laying on the bed. also found these calibration settings on CNET that seem to work pretty good.[...]Hope this helps

Reviews.Title: BEST for the price!!!
Reviews.Author: kranthi
Reviews.Content: BEST for the price!!! This product has a thin edge which is awesome to watch. Great picture, nice viewing angle.

Reviews.Title: MADE THE MOM-IN-LAW HAPPY!
Reviews.Author: ALFONSO R.
Reviews.Content: GREAT FEATURES, LIGHT WEIGHT, AND A GREAT XMAS GIFT!LOVED THE LIMITED WARRANTY, I FELT MORE SECURE WITH MY PURCHASE

Reviews.Title: Very Happy!
Reviews.Author: MsWaiwy
Reviews.Content: Went from a very small tv to this one and we absolutely love it!  Great picture!  Very happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: TCL 43'' LED
Reviews.Author: TWells
Reviews.Content: Arrived in 1 day. So far im very happy with the quality of this tv. It literally looks and feels better than most other name brand TV's i've owned. The fit and finish is perfect. Picture quality is on par with our Samsung and Sony Bravia tv's. You really cannot go wrong with this product. As far as sound, your not going to get anything incredible in such a small package from any tv maker. Do yourself a favor and buy a decent surround sound. Highly recommend this so far!

Reviews.Title: Signal Strength Indicator and Manual Input of Digital Channels
Reviews.Author: Harold A. Climer "hclimer"
Reviews.Content: So far I like this HDTV quite well. However I can see no way to enter Digital Channels manually. I have about 10 TV stations that I can pick up from my location near Cleveland TN. Hoverer, they are in many different directions.When I scan for channels in one direction, channels scanned in the other direction are lost.Also I can see no Signal Strength indicator on the screen or any way to turn it on.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ingrid "navypnp"
Reviews.Content: Easy to set-up and looks high end. Clear picture and good sound quality. Very good product for the price. I would recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at the right price!!
Reviews.Author: Liz Fitzgerald
Reviews.Content: Got this tv at a great price compared to other models of similar size. So far no problems (2 months in).

Reviews.Title: Very good value for 43" led
Reviews.Author: Butters
Reviews.Content: After reading other good reviews I pulled the trigger.  For  a $400 led this product exceeded my expectations.  Very good picture, slim design.  Does not look like a cheap tv.  Audio is decent.  There is no light creep or flash lighting around the edges like my old LCD.  2 year warranty pushed my concerns aside on longevity.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV!!!
Reviews.Author: Real Glowing
Reviews.Content: Have had this model for one year, very happy, great picture.  Much better than a lot of the other models I looked at that were more expensive and I did a lot of research on this before making a purchase.Two HDMI ports should be enough for most people: (surround sound system and DVD) but if that is an issue I would look into the newer models that have them.This does not have WiFi built in, but adding a Blue Ray player provides that with plenty of options.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: enkryptic1
Reviews.Content: It has a really good picture. Ample hook ups, good colors. I wish the sound was a little better, but overall a really good, inexpensive TV!

Reviews.Title: TCL LE43FHDF3300 43-Inch 1080p LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the money. Good picture, not a lots of feature for simple uses, sound is ok to me.

Reviews.Title: Pretty freaking awesome.
Reviews.Author: Donald M. Pollack
Reviews.Content: Better then I had expected! Was surprised at the great picture quality, and the sound was just fine. Easily assembled and up in running from box onto tv stand in under ten minutes. Longest part was letting it do the channel scan.No dead pixels or abnormal picture. Overall awesome deal.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: NMSKIES
Reviews.Content: Easy setup and great picture right out of the box.This tv is a fantastic buy for the price against the established brands. Great color, sharpness, contrast. No shadowing during Nascar, Indy races, Football or Baseball that I have seen. Sound could be better, but the speakers are on the bottom like most manufactures and that is why they make sound bars. In my living room. Visitors can't believe such a good deal. Thank you, TCL.

Reviews.Title: a very good TV for bedroom
Reviews.Author: roujiamo
Reviews.Content: I went to my friend's home and saw this TV in her bedroom. I was first attracted by the cute design. The glossy frame is super thin and I also love the glass base which makes me feel the TV is a high-end one. It's a 39" but it didn't occupy a large space in a small bedroom. The pictures is clear, and overall the picture quality is generally above average. I don't know how Sony and Samsung looks as short of direct comparison however when I know this TV's price here I feel it's really worthy for the money paid. The only thing  I don't like is the thickness when you look from the side of the TV. However, for bedroom and not-on-wall, this is a really decent LED TV.

Reviews.Title: TCL 43" LED tv 3300 - table stand assembly
Reviews.Author: heinivomstau
Reviews.Content: on 9/19/12 I ordered the TCL tv and it arrived at my house on 9/21/12 much sooner then expected and in perfect condition. this was my very first on-line order and it was a good experiance. After unpacking the unit it was a simple task to attach the stand to the tv with four (4) screws supplied. Now comes the problem. the screws are far to long and the stand can not be firmly attached to the tv. shorter screws are needed. on monday I called the TCL rep in the U.S. and was given another tel. number for their support dept. It took almost 30 minutes before I got through after hearing a recording in english then spanish followed by music and the assurance that my call was important to them. When I finally got a person I was told that they don't carry any parts and to contact amazon or go to a hardware store for the screws. for this the said the were sorry. I hope I never have to contact them for any warrenty issues. The LE43FHDF3300 is a very simple tv without the bells and wistles and delivers a dynomite picture. a very good value for the price just not sure about their counter part TTE Technology Inc. in Corona, CA.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: This TV is very good.  First tv had a couple of bad pixels, so I returned it to amazon for another.  New one arrived two days later.  Total time from order to second tv was 4 days.Awesome service Amazon.TV does not support hdmi CEC.  Image rivals the best I've seen.  Audio is fair.  Recommend boosting bass in equalizer settings.  Slim bezel is very nice.  Remote is pretty cheap, but works.  Would be nice to be able to label digital channels not just analog ones.Recommend highly.

Reviews.Title: Good Choice
Reviews.Author: ilovetv
Reviews.Content: This TV is very good in most features, the display is very clean and the pedestal is solid. But the sound is weak such as a deflated balloon. Also, the most significant problem is the coarse firmware. I have used some kinds of TVs in several major brand, it is the worst. This product might be best choice within this price. It has many external inputs, especially two HDMIs are excellent. As a result, I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: One of my greeatest buys!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Mr. MVP
Reviews.Content: Don't listen to what anyone says about this tv. It is one of the greatest buys of my life. The tv is a nice size and it is very clear of course after messing with picture settings to your style of picture. This tv is near perfect and I don't regret it at all. Nice sound, nice picture, nice size, it's just a nice tv for a nice deal.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Michelle Hermanson
Reviews.Content: I was unsure of buying an off-brand tv but for the price and after reading the reviews, I had to give it a try. The picture is great! Sound is good, and installation was easy. The only downfall is I have to use two remotes because this brand was not listed for configuring my satellite remote.

Reviews.Title: Cheap LED monitor
Reviews.Author: Viandroto
Reviews.Content: Best bang for your buck if all you want is a big screen monitor. Works without a hitch, hopefully no complaints in the near distant future. I find it nicer than my boyfriend's 37" Vizio TV that was $600 and refurbished.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Postively the Best Amazon Purchase I have ever made!
Reviews.Author: Ryan F
Reviews.Content: This television is incredible. It completely exceeded my expectations, especially for the price point. It is extremely vivid and clear. I highly recommend this product, it rivals with several more expensive televisions!

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: gimp
Reviews.Content: just what i wanted and great value will order another for my room love the thin bezel and sleek design thanks tcl and amazon

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value for the Price!
Reviews.Author: aschwind
Reviews.Content: I was super hesitant to purchase this TV at first, but after a friend bought it and I was able to see it, I was convinced. It came today and I spent all afternoon playing with it.The screen is absolutely gorgeous. The colors are as wonderful after a little bit of tweaking and the viewing angle is great. There is no backlight bleeding and no dead pixels.As other users say, the sound isn't the best, but it is loud and I got the bass I wanted by plugging my 2.1 speakers into the convenient headphone jack.For right now, this gets 4-stars.Anyone on the fence about buying TCL, don't be! It's a great value for the price and by pairing this with my Apple TV, I saved hundreds of dollars compared to the new smart TVs out there.

Reviews.Title: great choice for the price
Reviews.Author: angela
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a 43" flatscreen,for a great price, this is it.The size was ideal for the room, and the picture and sound both perfect.Don't think because you haven't heard of the make or the price is too low,that you are going to get an inferior product.  Definitely a 5 star rating

Reviews.Title: Excelllent HDTV and priced right
Reviews.Author: J. Bishop
Reviews.Content: This HDTV has an excellent picture.  The bezel is thin making the TV attractive.  The 2 year warranty is a plus.  Best of all the price.  In this price range nothing compares.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: C. Gao
Reviews.Content: This TV is really worth this price. So far so good.I will recommend to buy it.The screen is big enough.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: Minhnhat Phan
Reviews.Content: This is my very first TV and i'm very very satisfy with it. i recommend this for anyone who look for a good TV for a good deal

Reviews.Title: Great television!
Reviews.Author: The Captain
Reviews.Content: While I purchased this television from another vendor, the results would likely have been identical. This Chinese television (with a Korean Samsung video panel) has an outstanding picture for the money! I've owned this television for more than two months and have had no misgivings/reservations whatsoever about my purchase. I added a Maxell sound bar to "flesh out" my viewing pleasure, and haven't looked back.These televisions are an excellent buy for the money. If you're on a "budget" don't hesitate to buy a TCL television. While I may buy another brand when purchasing a Plasma unit, these are an excellent alternative for those of us that can't afford a "name brand" LED television.ENJOY!

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Dana Stetson "stetsoninc"
Reviews.Content: The TV is an excellent value and if you follow directions for attaching the stand there is no issue there either.Do not hesitate to buy this item if you do not care about it not being a brand name.

Reviews.Title: Took a while to get a good one...
Reviews.Author: cherry3m
Reviews.Content: The first TCL TV ordered had a blemish on the screen, most likely damaged in shipping.  I ordered the TCL as a replacement for a Panasonic that also appeared to be damaged during shipment.  The second TCL I received came via truck shipment, not UPS, and arrived in perfect condition.  Third time was the charm!The picture on this TV is crisp and clear, colors are bright, and blacks are dark.  The sound is so-so, about on par with any flat panel tv I've tried.  Remote is laid out reasonably well and easy to use.You have to scan for channels if you are using the tv's tuner for antenna or cable.  This takes a few minutes, then you have to manually configure channels to skip (shopping, religion, etc).  You can then label any analog channel, but not digital channels.  The process is a little clunky, since it has to be done within the menu, and you don't know what channel you are skipping/labeling without a channel guide.The only quirk I experienced is the time setting.  Using my time zone, and auto daylight savings, the set was off by one hour.  This makes the program guide off by one hour as well.  The solution was to set the time zone for one zone east, and manually set the time to the correct time.For the price, this is an excellent value.  It's actually the largest screen size for the smallest overall physical dimensions I could find.

Reviews.Title: 32" TCL LED TV
Reviews.Author: SuaSponte375
Reviews.Content: This TV has a very good picture, especially for a budget LED TV.I found the sound acceptable considering this TV has a very thin frame and the speakers fire down instead of toward the viewer.The TV has a 100 x 100 VESA mount.The holes are centered left/right but are toward the top third of the TV instead of the more normal center position.This higher VESA mounting point would not work for the mount I already had in place due to other items around the TV.By only using the lower two holes on the TV back and the upper two holes on the wall mount, I was able to center the TV back in the existing location and did not need to move the wall mount, drill new holes, patch the wall, prime/paint, .....The TV and wall mount feel very sturdy even using only two bolts.If you have the 24" TCL LE24FHDD20 and were wondering if this 32" has the same style external AC to DC 12 volt power brick, it does not.  The 120v AC cable on the 32" TV is hard wired into the back of the TV cabinet.  So unlike the 24", you do not have a direct 12 volt wiring option.

Reviews.Title: The first LED/LCD screen to not disappoint me.
Reviews.Author: J. Warren "NiALTA"
Reviews.Content: Super sturdy stand means that this TV WILL NOT WOBBLE. Excellent viewing angles. Acceptable sound. Bright-colorful-clear image quality. USB access for pictures and audio. Fantastic price.<<<Works beautifully as a computer monitor>>>

Reviews.Title: Superb TV!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Absolutely terrific LED tv. Came packaged perfectly without any damage from UPS. Easy setup with the base and the remote includes batteries.Amazing picture and sound. Really outstanding HDTV, the picture is outstanding.I was looking at local electronic dealer stores but came across this TV on Amazon and have no regrets at all. Probably one of my favorite purchases from Amazon. You literally cannot beat the quality of this TV for the money. Highly highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: TLC 39" TV
Reviews.Author: redeye
Reviews.Content: It's got great picture as long as there is no light behind me.But thats normal for LED tv's accept for Sharp.I got it for my camper because it's demintions are smaller than most 37' tv's,and it fits my space perfect,and the price was the best of all .

Reviews.Title: Def. Worth it
Reviews.Author: Et86
Reviews.Content: The tv came very well packaged, no flashy box. Took about 10 mins to attatch the stand only cuz I couldnt find a bigger screwdriver, was easy once I found one. All the other set up is real easy... The picture on this tv rivals those of the biggest brand names ranging 600$ - 1200$. It is an amazing tv if your looking for cool design with a great picture. The thin bezel design is great, all tv borders should be thin like this, more picture less plastic. This tv is a STEAL at this price. I may buy another 1 depending on how long they stay this price. If I had the $ I would probly order 2 more actually. Bottom line is if u want a decent size screen, with amazing picture, and good enough sound and dont need a tv with wi-fi or apps (i use with ps3 so I dont need apps or wi-fi) then I would def recommend this tv. Was hesitant about the brand but they had alot of good reviews so I tried em glad I did. If you think about it every company starts small (LG used to be goldstar or something like that). All in all happy with the purchase, fsss actually arrived very quickly too

Reviews.Title: So light and refreshing
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: I bought this 32" TV as a bedroom TV for mainly ESPN watching, movies and as PC monitor  The shipping was fast. The TV was easy to assemble out of the box and very light. I can lift it with one hand which is good for people for like to move their TV's around a lot. The actual menu configuration was pretty quick as well and I only needed a few tweaks to set it up as a PC monitor. The sound is fine as I'm not a person who cranks up the volume and I'm pretty happy about how thin the frame is. I would and have definitely recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Gregory O'Connell
Reviews.Content: Cons:2 HDMI (there should be at least 3 or 4)Speakers kinda suck - but not completely awful 3 out 5Pros:Great picture quality (which is most important)Low PriceLight Weight

Reviews.Title: Great!!
Reviews.Author: lei qun
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my parents as monitor connecting a laptop. It works great, easy to set up. They are very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Large Screen Display
Reviews.Author: Carmen
Reviews.Content: Intended use: large screen monitor for my desktop for visual aids, and it does this well - excellent resolution! Would recommend this unit for a hallway or commons area for advertising or agenda display, etc. No comment on TV capability , as I  haven't / don't use. Very lightweight! Feel it was a good value and I expect it will last.

Reviews.Title: Great picture but...
Reviews.Author: M. Thomas "travaler"
Reviews.Content: This was fine for  playing DVD's and Blue Rays  however it could not maintain a signal sync from our cable card box. tThe picture would play briefly go to black and then the picture agian, over and over

Reviews.Title: HDMI doesn't work.
Reviews.Author: Xiaodi Yu
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV in October 2012. I try to connect my TV to the apple TV via HDMI cable. And it just shows " no signal". I use the same Apple TV and the same cable to try my friend's TV. The image shows up immediately. Since I have already past the 30 days return period, I cannot return or change this tv. I just hope TCL can solve my problem.A reminder: For the people who just order this TV, do try the HDMI by yourself.

Reviews.Title: Amazon service on 43" TCL 1080P television
Reviews.Author: JLK "Jack"
Reviews.Content: I had purchased a 37" TCL 1080P television from Amazon in the past to use both as a TV, but also as an external monitor as I work on making DVDs, or working on digital pictures with PhotoShop.  Very pleased with the 37" TCL.  So, I had little reservations about purchasing another TCL for our bedroom.  I went to the higher end 43" with the smaller edge, and lighter weight and some features.  I depended heavily on Amazon Customer reviews, and also purchased auxiliary speakers from Logitech.  Very pleased with the TV, speakers and picture.  Setup was phenomenally easy with our Direct TV dish system (all other TVs in our home were connected by the Direct TV technician).After a couple of days following installation, I noticed two black parallel lines originating near the top LH corner of the screen.  The problem did not grow worse, nor did it go away.  I took a deep breath and decided to begin the return process (first time for me).  Amazon was fantastic to deal with!  They made it very easy, offering a UPS pickup option, though I preferred to take it to a nearby UPS Store.  Meanwhile, a new 43" TCL arrives ASAP with a 30 day period to allow for the returned unit so I would not be charged for the 2nd TV.I replaced the defective unit with the new unit, packed up the defective unit and followed Amazon's instructions for return. It was important to my wife that she have a TV in the bedroom.  It was important to me that I could do that, and still return the defective TV.  Amazon - Thank you!The new 43" TCL is giving us a great picture, and Amazon's streamlined, no-hassle return policy is the greatest.  I've purchased many computer and camera related products on Amazon without a problem.  In the future, where I am concerned about possible product damage from shipping and handling, I will look to see that Amazon is the seller, or at a minimum that the seller is highly rated.  Good job Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great budget TV
Reviews.Author: laidbackpk
Reviews.Content: Great tv for the money. Resolution is great.  Brightness is a little bit high compensating for something, but if you are willing to adjust the settings from what they are out of the box then it turns out to be pretty good.  Sound is tinny, but what do you expect.  I bought this because it was an inexpensive tv and it has far exceeded my expectations.  If you are thinking of buying this tv in place of a high end tv then lower your expectations according to the price.  The good thing is that the tv well exceeds expectations of its $350 price tag.

Reviews.Title: SOLID NO FRILLS TV!
Reviews.Author: JBFILMS
Reviews.Content: bought this at Amazon after researching many Tvs, and this is certainly the best bang for your buck. Shipping was super fast despite regular super saver!The sound is indeed weak, as was expected from other reviews, so you should buy a pair of small speakers or a soundbar, but you will still end up with a bargain and a nice screen (color is a bit different from an angle, though, ie less deep blacks etc, if that matters). The thin frame looks great! One thing I don't like is that the screen tends to take a while to switch between different resolution programs (ie HD and regular resolution) and it also always displays that info in some blue display in the corner, which is annoying. There should be a way to get rid of that small channel display (ie it says HTML 1 1080 x 720 dpi) as I don't really care for that info, I know I might be switching to a lower resolution channel you don't always have to tell me! If anybody knows a solution to that, pls let me know!

Reviews.Title: Keep the shipping box, just in case!
Reviews.Author: P. J. Patton
Reviews.Content: Purchased the 43 inch with Amazon Prime. Delivered perfectly. Set up a no brainer except for the stand, as other reviewers have noted. Eventually applied enough torque to get screws in. TV worked perfectly for four days. I then installed a second HDMI device (TV has two HDMI ports immediately next to each other.) WHen I installed HDMI2 the HDMI1 connection stopped working. After all the troubleshooting possible it was clear the problem is in the connection. Eventually  TCL answered their 1-800 number, took info, finally believed me and handed me off to their Calif based warranty service. TOld the entire story again. Sent the required proof of purchase and have been waiting for two weeks for them to call back to set up appointment to have set repaired.  WIll keep on it until it happens but starting to think I got what I paid for.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Lucy
Reviews.Content: It looks beautiful and works very well. It is definitely not necessary to spend more money to buy a so-called "big" brand like LG or Sony.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Warrant, do not trust
Reviews.Author: J. Ross
Reviews.Content: do not buy TCL tvs for their warranty.. if there is a warranty problem good luck with that.. each time you call there is a 30min-1 hour wait.. Everytime I call I am escalated to a new level or they tell me I have to do something and then call back again. I have had to call them 4 times already and my TV still isn't fixed.lucikly all of my phone calls are free and I can do other things while i'm on hold, but if you pay your phone by the minute it would be cheaper to buy a new tv then the cost of waiting on hold for their phone support.So far I have been on hold for 3-4 hours in total time, it has been over 1 month and my tv still isn't fixed. My TV had a problem after 1 month of using it. If you're buying this TV and expect to get any service at all stay away!

Reviews.Title: Has firmware issue that needs fixed like the 40 inch version!
Reviews.Author: Matt W
Reviews.Content: I'll make this short and sweet. I get the screen today from Amazon with their quick 2 day shipping. I open the box, packaging is great, put the TV stand on, put the screws in easily into the 4 unthreaded posts, takes a little bit of work but I had it done in under 2 minutes, some of the reviews on here are greatly exaggerated on here about it being hard to attach the base. I hook up my cable box, pleasantly surprised with the quality of the picture which actually looked pretty good once on "ECO" mode and even better when I switched to the "VIBRANT" mode preset. This TV will work great for what I need because all it will be used for, is for watching with the cable box hooked up to HDMI 1.Here is the problem which is why I took this from a probably 5/5 star review for the value, down to a 1 star review. There is a bug with this TV that was also on many of their other models that they released a firmware update to fix but they have no firmware update for this model. The issue as TCL described it in their firmware update instructions for their 40 inch TV (L40FHDF11TA) is the following:"Some owners may experience a condition, when using the HDMI connections on the TV, where the screen blanks out and loses sound for a few moments. This ﬁrmware update will correct that problem. This entire procedure should take about 5 - 10 minutes."This is the exact issue I am having with the TV. When I hook up my laptop with HDMI out set to 1920x1080 and I turn on a video the screen starts to go completely blank after 30 seconds like it has lost the connection, audio over HDMI also drops out too so the problem is obvious when it happens. The screen blanks out for about a second and then it is back, only to have the same problem happen again, after another 30 seconds.This is not the purpose I am using the TV for as it works fine with my cable box, but other people could have the same problem, and it may even occur with other cable boxes, Blu-ray players, etc...I am going to leave this one star review until they release a firmware update to fix this issue, people need to see this and know they may have a potential problem if the TV doesn't play nicely with the input device. Some people may luck out and it may work fine depending on the device like my cable box, but other people are going to be disappointed.If you want to see the firmware instructions for the 40 inch you can go to this link:tcl-django.s3.amazonaws.com/medialibrary/2012/11/L40FHDF11TA_Firmware_Instructions.pdfI was thinking about flashing the 40" firmware for the heck of it to see if it worked and if it didn't send the TV back since this is an issue anyway, but I don't think I'm going to risk it.

Reviews.Title: WOW SUPER AAA+++++
Reviews.Author: JR2673
Reviews.Content: JUST SO YOU KNOW THIS IS MY SECOND 43 IN TCL THIS TV IS MIND BLOWING.. I COM-PAIRED TO THE LG LS4600 47 INCH LED I KNOW BECAUSE I JUST RETURN ONE I BOUGHT AT BRAND-MARK  . SO I WENT & PICK THIS ONE UP INSTEAD AGAIN.. AND THE ONLY REASON FOR THAT IS MY KIDS BUSTED THE SCREEN ON THE FIRST ONE BUT .. SO LET ME SAY THIS TV IS THE BEST ONE I HAVE SEEN FOR A NO NAME BRAND & OWNED.. I THINK IT CAN STAND UP WITH THE SAMSUNG LINE IF YOU ASK ME .I USE THIS TV FOR MY 360 SLIM AND PS3 .. AND ITS MIND BLOWING !! WOOOW !! THE PICTURE ON THIS TV IS WAY BETTER THEN THE LG LS4600 LED TV 1000% DONT BE SCARED YOU CAN CALL THE SHOT ON THIS TV .

Reviews.Title: Lasted only 14 months
Reviews.Author: chris h
Reviews.Content: Stopped working after 14 months....avoid this company. Wasn't heavily used either, it worked last Friday the I didn't use it again until the next Thursday and in that time of none the screen died.

Reviews.Title: TCL or Russian Roulette
Reviews.Author: Alexander
Reviews.Content: Ok. You all have heard the adage, "You get what you paid for". Well, my experience with TCL hit that nail square on the head.Why two stars? Because I got a dead pixel within 12 days of purchase. At 17 days, 3 more pixels died. Is that normal? I don't know, but I was not happyThe tv itself is slim and looks great.The glass stand was hard to mount because the screws provided did not fit the holes.The picture was actually good, not amazing, not stunning, not crisp, but good.The sound is soft. It seemed like it had a break in period and eventually I could turn it down from 60.If you are planning on buying this tv, plan on buying a surround system too.However, Amazon kicks ass when it comes to refunds. I was outside the 30 Amazon refund policy, but got a full refund. I didn't have to pay for shipping, customer care was superb, and I will eventually buy a reputable name brand from Amazon in the future.Thanks Amazon, even though some manufacturers are below par, you are willing to make your customers happy

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Vicki DeFrank
Reviews.Content: Purchased this from Sam's Club with an additional 50 off which made this 40" LED tv 278.00.  Great/best buy for a 40 inch LED.  Picture is great.  The only draw back is my own issue which is that for the best HD picture you need an HD descrambler of sorts.  I only have 1 box from Dish but the quality of the picture is still great..  I didn't really have to buy a new tv...I really had an old 39 inch RCA monster tv but had been waiting for a great price and I figured if Sam's Club, as large a company (Walmart) as they are wouldn't sell something that was only going to be a big bomb.

Reviews.Title: Great price and great deal
Reviews.Author: Jen M
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about 2 months and can't complain! I don't watch TV too much, but it is nice how energy efficient this TV is for when I do want to watch. I like that it has 2 HDMI ports and component. Of course it has coax too. When I plug my 1080p phone in through the microHDMI-HDMI cable, it still has perfect picture. I'm super satisfied with this TV. I also love the thin bezel so I can fully utilize space.

Reviews.Title: Time will tell
Reviews.Author: Michael Feehery
Reviews.Content: When my wife and I purchased this TV we had done extensive research on TV's. I searched using the numbers off a Tv we wanted and this came up. I mistakingly didn't read the reviews. Since then I have read many reviews and AM NOT IMPRESSED with what I am reading! As far as the Tv we bought, it was for elderly relatives that we are visiting out of state. We can't have problems arise! Assembly was very easy, hook up was a breeze, even with it being Direct TV. I easily adjusted the picture and find it to be excellent. My father-in-law is going deaf and even he commented on how good the sound was. It may not be the optimum booming bass surround sound, but it does provide volume. As it sits, I am very happy with it, but as stated, we can't have problems. I'm considering buying a new major brand locally and either returning this one or taking it back home for personal use. More to follow...

Reviews.Title: TV okay
Reviews.Author: J.J. Simpson
Reviews.Content: The price was right for a second TV in a location in the house where guests might be expected to watch it.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: waty19
Reviews.Content: I was on a budget and this TV fit the price range I wanted to pay for a 43" TV.  After reading the reviews I decided to order it.  The TV isn't terrible but the picture isn't fantastic like many of these reviews say. On full HD TV its still not crisp.  It's a low priced TV for a reason.  I have a 5 year old 42" LG plasma that is much better.  The colors are vivid on this TV so thats a plus.  I recommend this TV for a playroom or office.  If I could do it again I'd order another plasma.  They are cheap and the picture is flawless.  Might not have the super bright colors but it has a more realistic picture. If your dead set on an LED TV your going to have to spend double what you would on this to get a "quality" TV.  Even the major name brand TV's that are a little more expensive don't have a better picture.  Your getting a good TV for the price you are paying.. Just don't expect a $2k picture quality.

Reviews.Title: I do not own this TV, I did not buy it, but Amazon insists on prompting me to review it
Reviews.Author: smtips "smtips"
Reviews.Content: Duh why do they do this, it's all a ploy to throw things in your face to try to make you buy something you already looked at and discarded.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Thomas A. Miller
Reviews.Content: This TV is a fantastic choice at this price. The picture is sharp and bright, and the TV itself is actually very attractive. The base is difficult to put on, but how many times are you going to have to do that? (the answer is one)Buy it.

Reviews.Title: Great Price, Nice Picture, Horrible Audio...but I knew this when I bought it!
Reviews.Author: Joseph R "Joe"
Reviews.Content: Absolutely the obnoxiously worst audio speakers in the history of TVs. BUT, that's OK! Fine Picture, Good Price otherwise.Seriously, in the pantheon of horrible TV audio, this unit is up there with the gods.*****But I Knew That When I Bought It!*****(Note: there are lots of other reviews that focus on the picture and probably describe it better than I. I will stick with other parts)In several reviews, this single fact (the bad audio) was the one noted repeatedly and yes, the speakers are as bad as everything written, but do not let that deter you from getting this TV. The solution is to grab a sound-bar (which you can get as cheap from $10-$75 or more) or set of computer speakers like the Cyber Acoustics Subwoofer Satellite System (CA-3602a) (about $40-$50) and you will have one rocking TV. I personally use a set of Bose Companion 2 Series II that I had from a previous TV and they work great. (The Bose speakers are not the best for TV audio, but it works for me.)The audio controls with the TV are fairly basic with a 5 band EQ and some other features like auto-sound level balancing, but it is pretty simple. The sound output is though a mini-headphone jack on the side. There is a on-screen control panel for Auto Volume Controll, SPDIF Type, Surround, balance  and internal speaker on/off. It is all very functional and easy to use. If you are some crazy audiophile, this may leave you wanting for more, but for the other 99.999% of the population across the inhabited world, it is fine.As noted in many other reviews here (and other places) the value in this TV is the fact the actual LED is SAMSUNG which makes a pretty big difference. That, along with the price were the reasons I bought the unit as I have other options for sound.If you really want to see some more detail, I suggest getting the PDF Manual for this unit. It is located at the following URL.............https://tcl-django.s3.amazonaws.com/medialibrary/2012/07/F3300_UM.pdfThe Quick Start Guide is located at this URL.........................https://tcl-django.s3.amazonaws.com/medialibrary/2012/07/F3300_QSG_6262012.pdfBoth files are free to download and view with Acrobat Reader or equivalent.As far as setup goes, it was easy. The pedestal base is a heavy glass that you should be careful attaching, but is not a big deal. Also the base measures 9"x19" so make sure you have the space. Also, there is no tilt on the base, so the entire unit has to be at the right level. The TV only sits about 2.5"above the glass base.AS far as wall mounting, I did not go that route so I cannot comment.Regarding the picture: The actual image seems fine to me. I really appreciate the 1080p resolution when it is available. When it is not (depending on the channel) it is really obvious. Color balance, sharpness, backlighting and other features are pretty standard and nothing really jumps out other than this unit is a good functional product. If you are looking to win contests with this (whatever contest that might be), this TV may not be the best....in fact I am sure it is not the best. What is it then? A decent picture with a simple solution for better sound that will work well for a majority of people. If you are trying to keep up with the Joneses or even be the Joneses that others want to keep up with, you might want to keep shopping. If you want a decent TV at a reasonable price, this one fits the bill.Finally, one small shortcoming that is not a huge deal, but it is there. The IR remote receiver on the TV is located in the bottom left corner of the screen. The issues is that there is a likelihood that you might put something on the table the TV sits on and block that receiver. Not a huge thing, but it would have been preferable to have the receiver at the top of the unit.I give it a 4 because for the parts (picture, price, warranty, size) that mattered to me. If you factor in the sound quality, the unit does not really live up to a 4 (maybe a 3 or 3.5) as it is so bad. However, as I knew before-hand about the audio, it was an easy decision to purchase. If you want a TV where the sound will  come from the actual TV, you will be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: TCL LE43FHDF3300 43-inch 1080 LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Mollie Weaver
Reviews.Content: The TCL 43" TV is just right for me.  I enjoy watching my favorite programs on this very clear picture TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Neeraj Joshi
Reviews.Content: TCL turns out to be a good manufacturer of LED TVs. We were skeptical at first but now 2 months with it, we really like it! We mostly use it for XBox and Netflix! Very satisfied with my purchase

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Poulami Barman
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv few months ago. Looks like it is working pretty fine up until now. Hoping it would not break down on me and then I have to deal with the customer care service.

Reviews.Title: Very nice product at a good price
Reviews.Author: "DoctorObvious"
Reviews.Content: I use this nearly every day and have seen no loss of picture quality or pixels.  Have had it since late November 2012, and it is nice for the budget too.

Reviews.Title: It was well shipped and appears to be a good product. I don't have one to compare to it but it seems fine.
Reviews.Author: Therese
Reviews.Content: It appears fine at this time. It's dimensions are as measured advertised so it's a perfect fit with my armoire.

Reviews.Title: Great viewing
Reviews.Author: Pali "numero 1"
Reviews.Content: My first led tv and it does show better than the lcds.  Has all the ports I would need and more, nice looking profile.  I do hope that it really makes a difference in power consumption.

Reviews.Title: Poor Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: MtCrag "small ears"
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my son but after installing and turning it on it was very clear the picture quality was simply sub par.  Great price but I guess you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: Melvin F. Diggs
Reviews.Content: This was easy to set up and I think that the picture is great. TV has a lot of good features that I did not know of, but are very useful.

Reviews.Title: Worked at first, then got continually worse.
Reviews.Author: Jimbol
Reviews.Content: We've had this tv for just over 3 months. Here is my story.The first month was great.  It worked really well.The second month it started turning on by itself randomly.  When it turned on like this the display would look funny. Like the columns of pixels were mixed around.  Also it wouldnt display anything other than a flashing error.  Nothing from the antenna or any other inputs.  We could turn it off and on again and it would work just fine but we took to leaving it unplugged so that it didnt turn on and waste energy when we weren't around.The third month the mixed up columns of pixels started showing up when we turned the tv on ourselves, not just when the tv turned on by itself.  So we started having to spend 5 minutes or so turning the tv on and off until it booted up properly every time we wanted to watch something.  This continued to worsen.  I think one time we spend 15 minutes turning it on and off before it worked.We are in the fourth month now and last night the tv would not turn on at all.  I got the messed up display up once and the screen glowed greenish for around 10 seconds once (thats a new one) but after an hour or so of trying.  We just decided to watch on our lab top.So now I have spent $400 dollars on a product that doesn't work.  Everything I hear about the warranty says its terrible and the TCL's FAQ page is severely lacking.If I'm missing some insight that would make this all go away please let me know but until such a thing arises I would say DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.  Its worth the extra $150 to get the name brand.

Reviews.Title: I cannot believe the "great picture" reviews.
Reviews.Author: H. Fredell
Reviews.Content: First off, amazing job Amazon for getting me this TV in two days and delivered on Christmas Eve.The stand was relatively easy to attach however, there were no threads in the receiving ports. I guess you have to screw directly into plastic. I am not sure how this will hold up if you every have to remove/reattach the base.It took about 2 minutes to plug the power cord in, attach the HDMI cables and go through the initial setup.Initially the TV picture looked pretty good but upon closer inspection I noticed pixelation around the edges of nearly everything on the screen.  I know LCD and LEDs have issue with fast moving images and the blocking or pixelation that occurs but this was seen with stationary images as well.Then a commercial came on that had a white background and that is when I noticed six, pixel thin lines running horizontally across the screen.  Once I noticed them I that was all I could see when the commercial was over.Needless to say, with the terrible support I have been reading about in these reviews I may just go ahead and return this.***UPDATE***I did the Amazon call back feature. 5 minutes later a rep from Amazon called, had me unplug all cables and power, hold the power button in for 30 seconds (to reset) and test again to no avail. Amazon gave me the option of a refund or replace. I am gambling with the replace. Amazon put in for a 1 day delivery and emailed me a pre-paid packing slip for the old one. Fingers crossed the next one is better.

Reviews.Title: Picture is good
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: However it is a non main stream TV so the cable company remote is unable to take control.  So to use it I have to use both remotes.  That has caused a problem twice with the size of the menus going off the screen because they are too big.  I just can't seem to figure out what causes it.

Reviews.Title: True LED T.V.?
Reviews.Author: Nalime
Reviews.Content: Pros:Amazing PictureHDMI CapabilitiesSizePriceCons:Glass Stand60hzNow I have a question...Is this a true LED television? For some reason this t.v. is really thick kind of like an LCD, so this makes me question it.Any responses would be helpful.And another question..since this t.v. is 60hz am i going to see a big difference between this one and a 120hz?Thanks!

Reviews.Title: I was cautiously optimistic when I ordered this TV based on the Amazon reviews...
Reviews.Author: Andrew Rizzo
Reviews.Content: I just received my 39" LED yesterday and I must say I am very satisfied. For around $350 after shipping, it is a tremendous "bang for your buck." Just a little tip for "Optimum iO Digital Cable" users, when I tried syncing my remote to the TCL I realized that it wasn't listed on their compatible TV companies list. No worries though, just type in the RCA codes until you get the right one (at least that's what worked for me). If you're on the fence about buying this TV because of the lesser-known brand name as I was, I would definately recommend you do (and save a couple hundred dollars).

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: Mariano Velazquez "marianovel"
Reviews.Content: I just got this TV yesterday and it is just fantastic.  I got the 39" because I was concerned about the 60hz bluring the image too much, but now I wish I had gotten the 43" for just $40 more.The image is super bright and crisp and the sound is just fine.  I keep lowering the volume on my kid.  I only have a rabbit ears antena.  Some PBS cartoons come in at 1280 x 720 and it looks great  (nothing nothing wrong.)  Olympic games come in at full 1920 x 1080 and it looks perfect.Because I am concerned about the brand and low price, I got a SquareTrade 4-Year TV Warranty ($300-350 LCD, Plasma, LED) here in Amazon for $47.  The whole deal is very affrodable.I am so happy with this purchase that I decided to take the time to write this review. I'll post updates if anything goes wrong.

Reviews.Title: Poor Warranty Service
Reviews.Author: Big P
Reviews.Content: This set may be good. I never turned it on. Recieved it OK, but when I went to assemble the stand they had sent the wrong screws. I called the cutomer service number in the instructions only to be referred to another number for the company that services TCL warranties. After several calls with no reply I returned the TV to Amazon. After I returned the set I recieved an e-mail from the TCL warranty company advising me that they could not supply the screws I needed and to get them at a hardware store. If ths is the kind of warranty service you get from TCL what good is their 2 year warranty.In researching the service company I found they had over 20 complaints with the BBB in the past year.

Reviews.Title: Underwhelming Performance...
Reviews.Author: Raju
Reviews.Content: So I'm a very tech savvy person, and normally do plenty of research before buying these kind of products because after all, this item will hopefully be operating in your house for 5+ years. I read all of the great Amazon reviews about the picture and trusted that the only thing this TV lacked was features (don't need em), and sound (that's what a surround sound system is for). The picture quality had been touted as AMAZING, and Samsung-esque.It simply fails at meeting this bar... at least for broadcasted HD.Through my Samsung Blu-ray player, movies looked pretty good, and for the most part, I was ok with the quality for a BluRay picture... However, when I switched to my cable box, and put on the NBA Playoffs, the quality suffered. Grainy, Blurry, not crisp AT ALL.To make matters worse, I bought this as a gift for my mother, and now I will be looking to replace this television by the end of the year. Please save another $200 and buy a Samsung or Sony. You won't even realize the heartache you skipped for not being a cheapskate.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: User1234
Reviews.Content: Can't beat this price for this unit. Picture is great however I don't think the sound is that advanced but its ok. HDMI connection well worth it, so far in my 4 month and its looking good.

Reviews.Title: My father in law wanted a bigger TV
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: This thing was $300. And for that price it is fan-freaking-tastic.I feel the need to point out he could have an extra two inches on the diagonal for $200-300 to him from time to time.Seriously, he has no room to feel short changed. It was a gift he paid nothing for and is better than his old TV in every single way.

Reviews.Title: Like Grandma's Presents
Reviews.Author: Ultra Andy
Reviews.Content: We had to send it back!Darn thing never worked. Don't know if it was broken in shipping or it was just bogus from the get-go, but the Television with no vision is little more than a paper weight, and with the world going paperless......

Reviews.Title: eh it's alright
Reviews.Author: Malachi
Reviews.Content: For the amount I paid, I expected it to be a lot more awesome. Especially in the year 2013. Word.

Reviews.Title: GOOD HI RES FLAT SCREEN TV
Reviews.Author: Don Speirs
Reviews.Content: AM VERY PLEASED WITH THIS HIGH QUALITY PRODUCT AT A GOOD LOW PRICE.  PICTURE AND SOUND ARE EXCELLENT..I WOULD HAVE GIVEN 5 STARS BUT TWO THINGS HAPPENED.  1. FIRST UNIT ARRIVED WITH A DEFECT IN UPPER RIGHT HAND CORNER OF SCREEN...PROBABLY HANDLED BADLY IN SHIPMENT.  AMAZON REPLACED IT IMMEDIATELY..2. BUT THEN UPS KEPT FAILING TO PICK UP DAMAGED UNIT...HAD TO GET AMAZON CUSTOMER SERVICE TO INTERCEDE.  I GIVE AMAZON CUSTOMER SERVICE 5 STARS, BUT UPS (VERY POOR SERVICE).. USING AN INDOOR ANTENNA CALLED THE "LEAF ULTIMATE" I GET OVER 25 CHANNELS, MANY IN HDTV,  AND I USE MY 2ND LAPTOP WITH A 15 FOOT HDMI CABLE TO GET ANYTHING I WANT OFF THE INTERNET, LIKE NETFLIX.. I ESTIMATE  THAT I SAVE OVER $1,000.00 A YEAR COMPARED TO PAYING FOR CABLE OR SATELLITE.

Reviews.Title: TCL LE39FHDF3300TA 39-inch 1080p LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Steven Freese
Reviews.Content: Cheap, Cheap, Cheap Craftsmanship. Poor picture quality! very disappointed stay with Samsung or Sony. Panasonic makes a good LED and Plasma.

Reviews.Title: worst tv ever!
Reviews.Author: Linda Nagai
Reviews.Content: I have never written a review regarding anything I have ever bought but I am compelled to advise anyone from purchasing this Tv.  The sound quality is soooooo bad.  The picture is is not sharp and clear.  Total disappointment.  Too much trouble to package and sent back or I guarentee it would be gone.  Hate it!!!!!!  Buyer beware!!!!!

Reviews.Title: so poor
Reviews.Author: Jimmy S. Seo
Reviews.Content: i have a 32" TCL  TV.  You know, this was OK first time, but..... after 1 year, just gone. also, warranty is limited.

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: Yoga Jiang
Reviews.Content: actually its not bad ,,,but i think its little bit uncleari think next time i will choose a better one.

Reviews.Title: Did not power on
Reviews.Author: JRC
Reviews.Content: Received in two days. Did not power on; when plugged in the power button was half illuminated in red, pressing the power button resulted in the the red light going off and nothing else. Extremely disappointed. Tech support closed until February 2013 how convenient. No replacements available because out of stock. Blessing in disguise I suppose. Amazon scheduled a UPS return pickup for the next day so looking forward to that. Putting the stand on is no easy task so if you have already ordered on plug in before installing the stand and if you haven't already ordered one, don't.

Reviews.Title: Assembly is a joke
Reviews.Author: IrieLove
Reviews.Content: The tv come with a piece of glass you need to screw into the bottom. No matter how many different ways I tried I couldn't get the screws to go in straight. Eventually the top of one screw stripped and I ended up with one that sticks out beyond the edge of the glass, so that the tv is constantly teetering when touched. My cat has become obsessed with pawing at it to make it wiggle. Add to that it seems without much force the tv could topple over easily and the stand is made of GLASS. The whole thing seems like a disaster in the making. My plan is to buy a wall mount and forego the stand all together (if I can get the screw out).

Reviews.Title: Really badly designed....
Reviews.Author: Andrew I. Munro Sr.
Reviews.Content: Why on earth would you mount the HDMI inputs so close to the back of the cabinet, that you can't insert them fully ?Also, although sold as new, this TV was definitely not new. You could see on the base of the stand where you insert the screws, that someone had mounted the stand before, as there were scratches where their screwdriver had slipped. Very disappointed that Amazon would ship this as a new item.Having mounted it on the stand it did not seem stable enough to support the weight of the panel. It has the stability and feel of a cheap computer monitor stand.I cannot comment on performance of the item as it was never even switched on. Due to the HDMI cables only being able to go in at an angle, thanks to the bad design.As nobody else has commented on this. I wonder if I just got a defective model. But either way it's going back and I have no wish to reorder it.You should also note that the dimensions Amazon are listing are incorrect, the TV is actually a few inches wider than stated.

Reviews.Title: Would have been a 5 star, but....
Reviews.Author: Trenton Hughes
Reviews.Content: I like the TV, I would recommend it to any one. Good picture quality, and the speakers are okay for the bedroom (not so much for living room). I'm using this for a computer monitor and the only complaint is the glare I get from the window. I bought the TV for $250 and it exceeds all my expectations for the low cost. =)

Reviews.Title: decent quality picture, one small complaint
Reviews.Author: rb.sr
Reviews.Content: No complaints at all about the picture quality: sharp, bright, and true colors.  My complaint is about set-up.  The base is attached to the set by four screws.  The screws need to bite into the plastic, but don't; the tips are dull and made from cheap (soft) steel.  Moreover, the heads have TINY (phillips-head) slots guaranteed to strip out.  I had to take a drill and enlarge and the deepen the pilot holes before I could get the screws them all the way in.  Do yourself a favor and BUY better screws before assembling this unit.

Reviews.Title: Unhappy Customer
Reviews.Author: Zenny
Reviews.Content: Product is not what I expected, you can buy a Brand New one for the price at Walmart and you won't have this kind of issue such as defective product it's probably why I was returned in the first place.  I will never buy a used TV again at Amazon,I have purchased a new 93" TV at Amazon and was very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: I got 2 TVs for the price of 1!
Reviews.Author: Seller_099
Reviews.Content: I ordered this highly-rated TV off Amazon and it looked inch perfect with the features and reviews. I opened the door to the awesome overnight delivery FedEx guy and he said I had 2 packages. First I thought one of it was the TV and the other was a stand or something. The guy said that it could be a stand because one of them was 'lighter'. He was wrong, because when I opened both the boxes, both of them had a freaking 39' TV! And I had ordered just one. I've never had a TV, this was my first purchase and it's already crazy.The TV works fantastically well, I haven`t tried the second one yet, i'm over the moon with excitement. It's the simplest installation, I didn`t even need to read the instructions. And my Amazon account only has charges for one! Could not have been a crazier first buy.

Reviews.Title: Thought it was the right TV for me
Reviews.Author: gadgetjunkie
Reviews.Content: I bought this 32" TCL LED TV and the 24" TCL LED.  I originally loved them both, but for some reason the 32 inch was uncomfortable to watch for long periods of time.I tried different picture settings, brightness, viewing angles, etc., but just couldn't stop blinking while watching it.  It's like my eyes were constantly trying to focus on the screen.  My wife said the same thing.  I kept the TCL 24", but the 32" went back and I bought a 32" Sony instead.  I can't specifically point out a reason why the 32" TCL was difficult to watch.  It may just have been that I had a defective model.The 24 inch TCL is still awesome, though.

Reviews.Title: Came up bad screws, really annoyed!!!
Reviews.Author: Balaji Balakrishnan
Reviews.Content: TV was good with excellent clarity and resolution. But the TV came up with very bad screws, which was very difficult to fit the stand in the TV. Never expected such a product to be delivered. Amazon had certified all products and this was not as I expected. I never tried the wall mount, but could be a option. I'm disappointed with this TV and the stand which came with.

Reviews.Title: 43 inch HDTV Defective on delivery
Reviews.Author: Johnny C. Martinez "JJM"
Reviews.Content: I was excited when this 43 inch HDTV arrived at my home.  I took it out of the packaging.  The packaging was factory sealed.  Once I hooked my HD receiver I was disappointed as the screen had dead color pixels all over and also had near the left and right edges of the screen diagonal lines.  I immediately went on Amazon and processed to return this item and get my money back.  If you are wondering how come I did not get a replacement let say I had bad experiences with a previous purchase of a piece of workout equipment from a reputable company that I did go that route and eventually the replacement was also defective so i am left with a defective product as the factory warranty has expired.  I did not want to go through that again with this product so instead I did the smart thing and am returning it and buying a better known brand SAMSUNG 40 inch HDTV.  Should have gone with them in the first place but the price on this TCL was very attractive.  But dont let me sway you away maybe I had a bad product come off the assembly line but then again that was what i said about the workout equipment.  Lesson learned go with a reputable proven brand even if it is a little more expensive.  Best Wishes.

Reviews.Title: Spend an extra hundred and get a better TV
Reviews.Author: Cindy Campbell
Reviews.Content: We bought the 39" LED. We wanted the biggest TV we could fit into our 36" wide spot, so we were between this one and a 37" LG LCD. The box said it's 36" wide - well, it's 36 3/8" wide, so we have to turn it sideways a little bit to fit in the opening - which we could have dealt with, but that was only the beginning of our disappointment. The Picture is SO bad, and the sound is worse. When we watch CNN news the anchor's head is chopped off (yes we know about adjusting the Aspect ratio). The remote control feels like a plastic toy, and only works if you're within 5' of the TV, so if you're in bed and you need to turn it up, well, you get up. The Direct TV won't program to it for some reason. Anyway, long story short, we made up our minds within a couple of days that you get what you pay for. We ordered the LG and as soon as it comes in, this cheap tv is going back to the store. Glad I bought it at Sears and they have a 30 day return policy.

Reviews.Title: Defective out of the box
Reviews.Author: drdzr
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift based on the average 4 stars reviews - It was real embarrassing when we plugged it in and the only thing that would come on the screen was a large crack pattern.  Hard to believe they did any quality control on this unit.  I will be sticking to brands I've heard of in the future (I also have an LG and Toshiba, which have worked fine.)

Reviews.Author: W. Forbes "Any Failure you meet is never a de...
Reviews.Content: Since I bought this to view mostly PC HDMI setting, this T.V/LED does not have higher resolutions for the PCMonitor HDMI settings, the highest is a measly 1368x768 this is far to large a viewing resolution for a 39" T.V PC monitor. Please up date your software for this..

Reviews.Title: Not that great as MAC monitor
Reviews.Author: L. Schrader
Reviews.Content: I tried this to replace an old Westinghouse 37 LCD monitor I had been using.  I found the text to be musshy and soft.  When comparing it to my other 3 monitors, it was clear that this monitor had to go back.  If you used this monitor without comparing it to a computer monitor directly, you might not see the difference.  Others have wrote that it is working fine for them, great deal then, but to my eye, I think it would contribute to a loss of vision.I also found the color of the MAC OS Lion background unable to display correctly, compared again to other monitors.  I tried calibrating the color in advanced mode on the MAC, and playing with the limited monitor adjustments.  The color never appeared correctly to me.I also sit fairly close to my monitors, one being an older 40' Samsung monitor, and found this 39 TCL to be blocky in text display.  Another quirk of this monitor, and it may be fine for some, is that it shuts off if the computer goes to sleep, again some might like this, but you have to wait for the startup cycle from scratch off all over again after turning it back on with the remote.I think, after looking at a Westinghouse LED monitor from a big blue and yellow store, the two are very similar, and to give some credit after looking at several other LED and LCD monitors running from a MacBook PRO thunderbolt display out, the two brands are better at text then many other new models I looked at, but not as good as some of my older monitors.  So it is better at text then some of the even higher end models I tried.  These TV's may be fine for some general video, but for serious up close computer work, it did not work well for me.If anybody has some ideas on nice large MAC monitors that work for them let me know.

Reviews.Title: READ JOEHOTELS REVIEW.
Reviews.Author: Barron J. Barton "BJB"
Reviews.Content: Amazon lists the dimensions of this TV as 31.1 x 3.8 x 23.3. This is wrong. The box states 35" x 3.6" x 23.08 thus this TV will not fit in my intended space. I have informed Amazon and they said they will correct error. In the meantime, if the dimensions are important to you please take note. Cannot attest to the quality of the TV as I'm returning it unopened, they say it's pretty good.
